text: Well, yes, compared to your other choices of expression this year, today's events are quite mild.  By the way, Bobby Rictor's gonad retrieval operation went quite well, in case you're interested.

speaker: PATRICK
text: Man -- don't say shit like that to  me. People can hear you.

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAEL
text: Sweet love, renew thy force!

text: You were right. She's still pissed.

name: Movie

text: No - I've got a sweet-payin' job that I'm about to lose.

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAEL
text: So you got cozy with she who stings?

name: Movie
speaker: PATRICK
text: I'm likin' you guys better

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAEL
text: I prefer to think of it simply as an alternative to what the law allows.

speaker: PATRICK
text: Yeah.

text: Ever been to Club Skunk?

name: Movie

text: Just for now.

name: Movie
speaker: PATRICK
text: Are you telling me I'm a -  "non-smoker"?

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAEL
text: Good enough.

name: Movie
speaker: PATRICK
text: What?!

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAEL
text: We're your guys.

speaker: PATRICK
text: You two are gonna help me tame the wild beast?

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAEL
text: Patrick, Pat, you're not looking at the big picture.  Joey's just a pawn. We set this whole thing up so Cameron can get the girl.

name: Movie

text: So Dorsey can get the girl?

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAEL
text: That's where we can help you.  With Kat.

name: Movie
speaker: PATRICK
text: Dorsey can plow whoever he wants. I'm just in this for the cash.

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAEL
text: I think I speak correctly when I say that Cameron's love is pure.  Purer than say -- Joey Dorsey's.

name: Movie
speaker: PATRICK
text: What is it with this chick?  She have three tits?

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAEL
text: The situation is, my man Cameron here has a major jones for Bianca Stratford.

speaker: PATRICK
text: What plan?

text: Whatever the hell it is you're standin' there waitin' to say.

text: What?

text: See you next week!

name: Movie
speaker: MISS PERKY
text: You're completely demented.

name: Movie
speaker: PATRICK
text: Well, you know -- there's the prestige of the job title... and the benefits package is pretty good...

name: Movie
speaker: MISS PERKY
text: You weren't abused, you aren't stupid, and as far as I can tell, you're only slightly psychotic -- so why is it that you're such a fuck-up?

name: Movie
speaker: PATRICK
text: What's to discuss?

name: Movie
speaker: MISS PERKY
text: Why don't we discuss your driving need to be a hemorrhoid?

speaker: MISS PERKY
text: I'm at a loss, then.  What should we talk about? Your year of absence?

name: Movie
speaker: PATRICK
text: Touch of the flu.

name: Movie
speaker: MISS PERKY
text: I don't understand, Patrick.  You haven't done anything asinine this week. Are you not feeling well?

name: Movie
speaker: MISS PERKY
text: With the teeth of your zipper?

speaker: PATRICK
text: It was a bratwurst.  I was eating lunch.

text: It says here you exposed yourself to a group of freshmen girls.

text: I missed you.

text: That ' s what I thought

text: Kissing?  Is that what you think happens?  Kissing isn't what keeps me up to my elbows in placenta all day.

name: Movie
speaker: ALONSO
text: Can't be that far, I say.  Also, I don't like the smell of the sea around here.  Smells like a cunt. Bad sign...

name: Movie
speaker: SAILOR
text: We left three weeks ago, Alonso. Can't be that near.

name: Movie
speaker: ALONSO
text: We should have seen land.

name: Movie
speaker: SAILOR
text: We'll all go crazy...

name: Movie
speaker: ALONSO
text: He's the devil's child...

name: Movie
speaker: ALONSO
text: With a face like that?  I don't want you looking at me.  You hear?

name: Movie
speaker: SAILOR
text: Ah, leave him alone.  He's doing no harm.

name: Movie
speaker: ALONSO
text: What are you listening to, chicken ass?

name: Movie
speaker: ALONSO
text: You'll be drinking your own piss... For the glory of Spain... and Admiral Colon...!  Bastard!

name: Movie
speaker: SAILOR
text: The water's going putrid in the barrels.

name: Movie
speaker: ALONSO
text: I never seen heat like this!  Not even in Las Minas!

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: IF-GOD-WILLS-IT!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Asia can be found to the west -- and I will prove it.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Blind faith is what I consider heresy!

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: Don't you realize your words could be considered heretical?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Did He not choose a carpenter's son to reveal Himself to the world?

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: If God intended our proximity to Asia, do you believe he would have waited for you to show it to the world?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: No.  The Portuguese have already discovered black-skinned people.  I, too, will find other populations -- and bring them to the word of God.

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: Is that all that interests you? Gold?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Trade, Your Excellency.  According to Marco Polo, the Kingdom of China is one of the richest of the world. Even the meanest buildings are roofed with gold.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: If they agree to follow me, yes.

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: Your life, and that of others!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Your Eminence, there is only one way to settle the matter.  And that is to make the journey.  I am ready to risk my life to prove it possible.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Excellency, you are right.

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: Senor Colon, an experienced captain such as yourself will understand our concern with the crew.  I am not willing to have on my conscience the loss of men who would have relied upon our judgment.

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: Then you cannot ignore that according to their calculations, the circumference of the Earth is approximately...  22,000 leagues or more.  Which makes the ocean... uncrossable.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I am, Your Eminence

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: Unfortunately, Don Colon, that is precisely where our opinions differ...  Are you familiar with the work of Aristotle?  Erathostene?  Ptolemeus?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Yes, your Eminence.  The voyage should not take more than six or seven weeks.

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: You say Asia can be found by sailing west?

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: A waste...?  Let me tell you something, Arojaz.  If your name, or mine, is ever remembered -- it will only be because of his.

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: What a tragedy... what a waste of a life...

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: You can see for yourself.

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: On the contrary, Your Eminence.  It seems to me the man is preparing his own cross.

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: It won't be easy to get rid of your prophet now, Don Sanchez.

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: Indeed.  The world is full of mercenaries -- and states often make use of them, when it benefits them.  My only concern is the welfare and prosperity of Spain.

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: He is a mercenary!  Did he not already try to convince the King of Portugal of his absurd notions?

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: Naturally.  But I would really deplore the loss of such a potential opportunity for Spain for a... dispute over a point of geography.

name: Movie
speaker: AROJAZ
text: The Judgment is ours!

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: The State has some reason to be interested in this man's proposition, Your Eminence...

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I can't keep my eyes off you.  I would like to catch up with all the moments I didn't spend with you.

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: What is it, now?  Tell me...

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: I am busy inside.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Can't you stay with us a little?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Not everything... Do you think I care?  I'm a free man again.  Riches don't make a man rich, they only make him busier...

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: They took everything...

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: They tried... but I didn't let them.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: God... you're so beautiful!  I can't believe no other man has ever taken you away from me...

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I can arrange for the Queen to take Fernando and Diego into her service.

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: You don't usually ask.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Beatrix, I want to ask you something.

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: That's something you can't decide.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I don't want you to wait for me.

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: I'm not asking you to swear to anything.

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: Thank God...

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: She said yes.

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: I find that hard to believe.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Perhaps I was never meant to live with a woman...

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: I'd love to argue with you sometimes.  But you're never here!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Are we going to argue?

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: Well... that's true.  I have a child by a man who won't marry me!  Who's always leaving...

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I haven't given you much of a life.

name: Movie
speaker: BEATRIX
text: I know.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I could be gone for years.

name: Movie
speaker: BOBADILLA
text: I am afraid this is not the worst news.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: How could I be?  The mainland has been found.  Exactly as I said it would.

name: Movie
speaker: BOBADILLA
text: I am not a seaman.  But I heard it is no more than a week at sea.  I hope you are not too disappointed.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: How far from here?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Congratulations.  Then I am free to search for the mainland.

name: Movie
speaker: BOBADILLA
text: Viceroy of the West Indies.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Appointment to what?

name: Movie
speaker: BOBADILLA
text: My letters of appointment.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Yes... I remember...

name: Movie
speaker: BOBADILLA
text: Don Alonso de Bobadilla.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Bartolome and Giacomo Colon.

name: Movie
speaker: BOBADILLA
text: May I ask by whom?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Forgive me, Don Bobadilla -- those positions have already been taken.

name: Movie
speaker: BOBADILLA
text: I understand that you will soon be appointing Governors for the islands?  Is it not so?

name: Movie
speaker: FERNANDO
text: Tell me the first thing that comes to your mind.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Really?  God... I wouldn't know where to start... and yet...

name: Movie
speaker: FERNANDO
text: I want you to tell me everything you remember, Father.  From the beginning.  Everything.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: He never had one... except aboard my ships!

name: Movie
speaker: FERNANDO
text: He asks when he can come to visit you.  He left his address.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: What does he say?

name: Movie
speaker: FERNANDO
text: I am not listening, Father.  But I can't help hearing.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: What are you listening to?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: There must be a passage to that other ocean.

name: Movie
speaker: FERNANDO
text: Father...

name: Movie
speaker: FERNANDO
text: Not bad.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: How are you feeling, Fernando?

name: Movie
speaker: FERNANDO
text: This time with me!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I have to explore the mainland.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Yes... Yes, I do... On all of them!

name: Movie
speaker: FERNANDO
text: Do you swear on all the Holy Saints in heaven?

name: Movie
speaker: FERNANDO
text: You promise?  Do you swear on St. Christopher...?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: There'll be a time.

name: Movie
speaker: FERNANDO
text: I want to go with you!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: All of them created by people like me.

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: Roofs... towers, palaces... spires...

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: What do you see?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Look out of that window.

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: I am not afraid of you.  You are nothing but a dreamer.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Call them.

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: All I have to do is call the guards.

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: To rise so high, in so short a time, is a dangerous occupation.  A little hypocrisy goes a long way.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: What...?  Do I have so many already?

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: You seem to have a special talent for making friends.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Good!  We are also in need of judges.  Except there are no thieves!

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: Don Bobadilla is already a judge, my Dear Don Cristobal.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: But we do have a lack of notaries. You should contact my administration.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: ... for a commoner?

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: You defend yourself admirably...

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: Forgive me, Don Colon.  But what about gold?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: They don't see sin in their nakedness.  They live according to nature, in a never ending summer. The islands are covered with trees, filled with blossoms and fruits. And...

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: If you won't accept our proposal, we'll simply find someone who will.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: And were you never ambitious, Excellency?  Or is ambition only a virtue among the nobles, a fault for the rest of us?

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: Then you are too ambitious.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I'm not bargaining!

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: I remind you, Senor Colon, that you are in no position to bargain with me.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: NO...!  I have waited too long, fought too hard.  Now you expect me to take all the risks while you take the profit!  No... I will not be your servant!

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: No?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: No...

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: You never learned how to speak my language.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Utapan, won't you speak to me?  You used to know how to speak to me.

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: You did the same to your God!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: You have to find them, Utapan.  Look what they did!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Ask him if he will help.

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: He understands.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: We will work with his people.  We want peace.  Ask the Chief if he understands?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: He has medicine.  Tell him we admire his people.

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: Chief says...

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: ... and also to bring medicine.

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: Chief says -- he has a God.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: To bring the word of God.

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: Why?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Thousands.

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: Chief says -- how many?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Tell him his country is very beautiful.  Tell him we are leaving men here -- to build a fort.

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: Chief knows.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Tell the Chief we thank him.

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: You come!  You speak first!

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: Island.  Far.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: What is it?  A tribe?  An island?

name: Movie
speaker: UTAPAN
text: Say not here!  Cuba!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I don't know... I have the impression that I didn't change that much.  I still can't accept the world as it is!

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: Oh?  So you are a new man?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: New worlds create new people.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: I knew you would.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I have to disagree.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: You'll always be older than me, Father.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: I suppose we're both old men now.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Give me absolution.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: I believed in you...

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: You are bound by an oath, Father.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: My son, my son...  Your certitudes are sometimes frightening...  Christopher, you must speak to them. And if you don't I will.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: If I tell them, they won't follow me.  You know that I am right, Father.  You trust me...

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: May God forgive you...!  You must tell them!  You must tell your men!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I am not sure... It could be twice the distance.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: How long?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I lied.  The journey will be longer than I said.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: What are you saying?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Father, I have betrayed my family. I betrayed my men.  And I betrayed you.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: I am listening, my son.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Forgive me, Father.  For I have sinned.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: In Nomine Patris et Filius, et Spiritus Sancti.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: Colon!  Don't!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: All of them!  Just lies!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Damn all of you!  You all set up theories based on what?  You never leave the safety of your studies! Go out!  Find out what the world is about and then tell me something I can listen to!

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: Colon!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Damn God!

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: If God intends you to go, then you will go.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Wait!  I've waited seven years already!  How much longer do you want me to wait?

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: You mustn't give way to despair. You must wait.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: Only God knows the meaning of such words, my son.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I've been contradicted all my life... Eternity!

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: You get so carried away when you are being contradicted!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Passion is something one cannot control!

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: Father Marchena!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I'll try to remember that, Marchena...

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: Two minutes... and already you're a dead man.  Don't let passion overwhelm you, Colon.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: So was Christ!

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: Esdras is a Jew.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: The calculations of Toscanelli Marin de Tyr, Esdras...

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: How can you be so certain?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Ignorance!  I believe the Indies are no more than 750 leagues west of the Canary Islands.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: How can you be so certain?  The Ocean is said to be infinite.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: To open a new route to Asia.  At the moment there are only two ways of reaching it...

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: Why do you wish to sail west?

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: With some difficulty.  I had to promise them you were not a total fool.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: How did you manage it?

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: That's what it says.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: God... That's in a week!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Father, I am doing what I think is the best for him.  And he has the teacher I would have chosen for myself.

name: Movie
speaker: MARCHENA
text: Diego is a bright boy -- a pleasure to teach -- but so serious... Brothers should be raised together, Colon.  Even brothers from different mothers...

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Your Majesty -- some men are content to read about things.  I must see them with my own eyes.  I cannot be other than I am.

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: There is one thing I'd like to understand... Why do you want to go back, after all this?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Thank you.

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: But without your brothers.  Nor are you to return to Santo Domingo or any of the other colonies.  You may explore the continent.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: They come and go as naked as the day God created them...

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: Do they have such thoughts?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Thirty seven, Your Majesty... And you?

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: How old are you, Senor Colon?

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: A woman?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: I know what I see.  I see someone who doesn't accept the world as it is.  Who's not afraid.  I see a women who thinks... "What if?"...

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: You show no inclination to speak otherwise!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: May I speak freely?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Surely you can do anything you want.

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: I cannot ignore the verdict of my council.

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: That she was impregnable.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: What did they say about Granada before today?

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: The ocean is uncrossable?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: No more than the woman who said she would take Granada from the Moors.

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: I should not even be listening to you, since my council said no.  But Santangel tells me you are a man of honor and sincerity... And Sanchez, that you are not a fool.

name: Movie
speaker: MOXICA
text: You will regret this.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: You'll be held in detention, deprived of your privileges and possessions.  Until you are returned to Spain where you will be judged. Have you anything to say?

name: Movie
speaker: MOXICA
text: Savagery is what monkeys understand.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: In one act of brutality, you have created chaos.  Tribes who were fighting each other are now joining forces against us!  All that because of your criminal savagery!

name: Movie
speaker: MOXICA
text: You did not hear me, Don Colon.  Not my horse.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Don Moxica -- we all have to work.

name: Movie
speaker: MOXICA
text: My horse doesn't work.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: We can't raise the wheel without it.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: We came here to stay!  To build! Not to start a crusade.  In this forest, there is enough danger to sweep us away in days!  So we will be brave and swallow our grief.  And in the name of those who died, we will accomplish what we came for.

name: Movie
speaker: MOXICA
text: We don't need to know.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: You want a war?  Fine.  We are a thousand.  They outnumber us by ten! Who will you kill?  Which tribe?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: If you want to keep your head on your shoulders, you'll do as I say.

name: Movie
speaker: MOXICA
text: We lost cousins, friends.  We will wash this in blood.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: The Indians have no such word, Don Moxica.

name: Movie
speaker: MOXICA
text: And you say this is an Indian vice? By God!  I don't see any kind of pleasure that would make this a sin.

name: Movie
speaker: MENDEZ
text: We can't be.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: He's drawing an isthmus... He's saying we're on an isthmus.

name: Movie
speaker: MENDEZ
text: What's he doing?

name: Movie
speaker: MENDEZ
text: Twenty eight.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: What do you read?

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Come over here.

name: Movie
speaker: MENDEZ
text: Well, I surely know what a quadrant is!  But I've never seen it used at night before.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: And what do you think Mendez?

name: Movie
speaker: MENDEZ
text: Well... It's the men, Sir.  They wonder how you know our position. We've lost sight from land days ago...

name: Movie
speaker: MENDEZ
text: God be with us admiral.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Due west, Captain Mendez.  And may God be with us...

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: You're right.  Let the men decide.

name: Movie
speaker: PINZON
text: You tell that to them!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Pinzon, Pinzon... All we can do now is go forward!  Think about that!

name: Movie
speaker: PINZON
text: You bloody...

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: You never did.  You did all the talking for both of us, remember?

name: Movie
speaker: PINZON
text: Jesus Maria!  I should have never listened to you!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: And then what?  Half of the water has gone, the rest is nearly putrid! You know that!

name: Movie
speaker: PINZON
text: You don't know anything!  Listen Colon, these are my ships, right? So I'm telling you we're turning back!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: The land is there.  I know it!

name: Movie
speaker: PINZON
text: We're lost!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: You think I don't know that?

name: Movie
speaker: PINZON
text: We're on the verge of a mutiny, Colon!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: We have to keep the hopes of these men alive!

name: Movie
speaker: PINZON
text: You must be mad...!

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Six days ago, yes.

name: Movie
speaker: PINZON
text: You lied!  You cheated!  We're way past 750 leagues!

name: Movie
speaker: PINZON
text: Immediately.

name: Movie
speaker: COLUMBUS
text: Where can I meet this man?

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: Because he is not afraid of me.

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: Then why?

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: I know, I should not tolerate his impertinence.

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: And who would you think of, for such a task?

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: He must be replaced.

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: Then, what do you suggest, Don Sanchez?

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: Is this true, Brother Buyl?

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: ... But there is worse.  He ordered the execution of five members of the nobility...

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: We weren't expecting immediate profits, were we?  We must have faith.  We must give time for time.

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: Every ship returns with a cargo of sick and dying.  But with no gold! The new world proves expensive, Your Majesty.

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: Yes.  It would be a pity, wouldn't it?  Call him back!

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: ... Into a monk...

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: Never, Your Majesty.  Although...

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: You were right, Don Sanchez... His demands could never be granted.

name: Movie
speaker: SANCHEZ
text: Yes, Your Majesty.

name: Movie
speaker: ISABEL
text: Is that the man I knew, Treasurer Sanchez?

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Officers, there's your killer, do your duty, arrest him!

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: ...so we kill someone famous and if we are caught, we are sent to mental hospital...

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: I don't think it's abuse, I think it's torture.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: I'm abused.  Don't you think?

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Can I see your back?

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Out on my back when I was a small boy.

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Your father put cigarettes out on you?

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: That's what he did to me.  He put cigarettes out on me.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Yeah, he hated me from day when I was born.  Put it out.  Can you put the cigarette out?

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Your father blamed you for your mother's blindness?

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Yeah, yeah...bad doctor gave her bad drugs which made her go blind.  And my father blamed me for her blindness...

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Back in the Czech Republic?

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Yeah, she went blind giving birth to me. She went to fucking black market doctor to induce me.

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Your mother was blind?

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: My father always degraded me.  Killed my self-esteem.  And my mother was blind.

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Tell me about yourself.  What you did as a young boy... what your parents were like.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Give me another one, please.

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: I need to know about your background.  I need to know about your upbringing.  Why you're here.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: What else do you need?

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: This is not about money, Emil.  I need your trust in me.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Thirty-percent.  No more.  Or I call another lawyer.  This is the biggest case of your life.  Don't try to negotiate.  Thirty percent.  Say yes or no.

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: But it's...

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: No.  No way.

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: I would say...half.  Half is fair.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: What's your cut?  How much?

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Look, I haven't really focused on that kind of thing.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: What about my movie rights?  Book rights?

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Don't worry about him.  Think about yourself.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: No, he is here.  Shit...

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Disappeared.  They're looking everywhere.  Maybe he went back to Czechoslovakia.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: What about Oleg?

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Well, you didn't appreciate the severity of it until recently.  No question about that.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: I was all of these.

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: ...delusions and paranoia.

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Oh, sure.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: You bring the cigarettes?

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: I brought you some letters.  It's really fan mail.  Women mostly.  One wants to buy you clothes, another sent a check. Another wants a check.

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: I'm invoking rights - this man is represented by counsel.  I'm coming with him.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Yes.  Yes, come with me!

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: I'm coming with you.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Where are we going?

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Don't say anything.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: He has the camera!  He took the movie!

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: Emil.  Take it easy.  Stay with me.  Sit down.  What do you need?  What are you looking for?

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Oh no!  No!  Shit!

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Here.  I have your money.

name: Movie
speaker: CUTLER
text: I'm not your lawyer until I see the money.

name: Movie
speaker: EMIL
text: Are you my attorney?  I'm Emil.  I'm insane.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Daphne, I...

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: I don't want to drag you down with me.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: ...Do you really want me to forget about you?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Forget about me.  You have enough problems of your own.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Pouring it out!

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: What are you doing?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: I'll get my clothes.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: I'll make some for us.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: In the kitchen.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Do you have coffee?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Right.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: You better get packed.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: I'm glad I met you.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: No matter what happens...I'm glad I met you.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: A good Immigration lawyer could stall the process.  Eddie recommended one.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: If you were my boyfriend, I'd suggest you find another girlfriend that isn't going to jail ten-thousand miles away.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: If I was your boyfriend, I might be.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Ludwig?  He's gay - are you jealous?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Is he your boyfriend?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: I'm sorry.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: I still can't believe Eddie's gone.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Are you alright?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: I'm sorry.  I didn't mean to...I'm glad. Actually I'm glad it's over.  All this time.  Hiding.  Never being able to look anyone in the eyes. Always afraid that someone would find out who I was.  Never trusting anyone...

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: They're not gonna send you right back.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: You don't know.  I'm sorry.  I was desperate.  That's not me.  I shot a cop.  Can you imagine what they'll do to me when I got to prison?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: I know.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: I'm not a whore.  I'm not a whore.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: I'm just trying to find out who you are.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: What are you asking me?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: So you were never a prostitute?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: I came here.  I had no money.  I knew no one.  I couldn't get a job because you have to have a green card to get work. They approached me - I could've made a lot of money.  I considered it, but... it's not who I am.  They pay me below the table at Ludwig's.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: No.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: What about back home?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: No.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Did you ever turn tricks before?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Yes, I considered it.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: You considered becoming a prostitute?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Yeah.  This way.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: So...the station is empty?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: The men are out of quarters - practicing putting out fires.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Somewhere else?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: I can't take you to my place.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Do you live alone?  I've been in these clothes since...the killings.  Could we stop at your place? I could take a shower...before I go into custody?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Divorced.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Are you married?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: They won't until this is over.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: I will if they don't send me back.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: If you cooperate with the DA - maybe they'll help you with your situation.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Now I become custody of police department?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Yes, but he was a cop.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Alright.  That's a justifiable homicide.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: ...my little sister and I shared a flat - I came home one night and a man was raping her.  His gun was on the chair... He came at me and I shot him.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: You're a cop - you'll never believe me.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Look, we can help you but right now we have to deal with what's happening here. Tell us the truth...is that the truth?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: I'm from a small town in Slovakia.  Like the South here.  The Police is right, a civilian is wrong.  So I fled.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: A cop?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: No, no, don't talk to Immigration!

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Are you here illegally?  Don't worry about that.  We'll talk to Immigration. They won't deport you.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Arrest you for what?  Why would we arrest you?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: If I tell you, will you arrest me?

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Whether you tell us or not, we'll find out.  Better if it comes from you.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Go on.

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: Tamina was a friend of mine.  My shower was broken, she let me use theirs.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: C'mon, start at the beginning.  You know these people?

name: Movie
speaker: DAPHNE
text: I told your partner, I can't help.  I didn't see anything.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Yeah, sure.  Beep me when you're ready for the press conference.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: I'm ready to be briefed.  Excuse us.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Oh yeah...?  Alright.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Look, after Jordy briefs me, you can do the press conference.  How about that? The case is all yours.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Well, I'm the Deputy Chief Fire Marshall and every now and then I'd like to be included in decisions.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: It was my decision, not his.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Oh.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: There's nothing to talk about.  Get a good lawyer.  You're suspended until your trial.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: But Chief?  Over this??

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: How are you going to fight this?  Maybe if Oleg hadn't gotten away and you'd been on the front page, as a hero, this thing would be easier to fight.  You'd have the good to weight against the bad! It's unfortunate that I have to make decisions based upon your press coverage but there's nothing I can do!  Gimme your shield.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: End my career?

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Well this is gonna end your career and probably mine.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Chief - I know I screwed up - but this guy was no innocent civilian.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Forgot?  You handcuffed a civilian to a tree?!

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: What was I supposed to do?  The guy tried to mug me.  I was gonna send a cop back - I just forgot.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: The public doesn't have any idea what we do and now you're going to define our image!  This is going to be our Rodney King!

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Okay.  But not water sports.

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Chief - mind if I take her?

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Oh really.  That's nice.  You took a homicide witness to take a shower after your partner was shot?  Are you out of your fucking mind??  Are you having that much trouble gettin' dates?!

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: No!  Nothing happened.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: A shower!?  Did you take one, too?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: I let her take a shower.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: What do you mean, 'cleaned up?'

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Ladder 20 was on the Rock for training. We stopped there... so she could get cleaned up.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: I came to see how the investigation was going.  I called and you're not here.  I wait up at the station and you don't even show up!!!  I beep you - you don't return my call.  Where the hell have you been?!

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Hey, Chief, what are you doing here?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: 'Cause we got more important things to do, like finding out who did it.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Then why didn't you talk to the reporter?

name: Movie
speaker: JORDY
text: Who do you think, Chief?!

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Who did cause and origin?

name: Movie
speaker: KORFIN
text: Yeah.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Alright.  Swing by her apartment.  Let her pick up her clothes and take her straight to Hoover Street.  You got that?

name: Movie
speaker: KORFIN
text: Yeah.  He finished awhile ago.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Did the D.A. videotape her deposition?

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: You do that, wiseguy.  Now let's solve this thing before Eddie Flemming does.

name: Movie
speaker: KORFIN
text: I said, yeah, you're right, Chief.  As soon as we get somethin' we'll let you alert the media.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: What was that, Korfin?

name: Movie
speaker: KORFIN
text: Yeah, right.

name: Movie
speaker: DUFFY
text: Don't you guys understand?  It's all about image.  The better we look the more money I get to pay you guys overtime.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: I know.  Relax.  Take it easy.  Don't worry, we'll get those fuckers.

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: He got my gun!  Motherfucker was filming the whole time!

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: No.  I'm okay.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Are you hit?

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: Stay with her.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: The other side of the street.  The guy with the videocamera.  Don't look - put her in the car.  Stay this side.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: C'mere.  You wanna go to homicide school?  Here - make yourself useful.

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: Yeah.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Only one guys checked in?

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: It's okay.

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: Sorry...PD only.

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: Still unknown but we're running prints. Kid over there caught the case.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Any I.D.?

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: Takin' a bath.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Where is she?

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: A timer.

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: What's he looking for?

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: You ready?

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Tomorrow.  At lunch.

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: When?

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: I'm gonna propose.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: What's the kid gonna say - sorry? Meanwhile I'm not here anymore. Like last week - we were at the morgue and this guy was all chopped up - spleen here - liver there - his heart in a pan. Six hours ago this guy was walkin' his dog or buyin' a quart of milk.  Who knows?  But some kid's robbed him for $3 or some shit and shot him and now you can't tell if he's a piece of beef or a human being and I'm thinkin' that's me. Sooner or later.  That's me.

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: It was freaky, I'll tell you.  Stupid kid.

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: Maybe you could just put in a shot of Martell?

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE
text: Vodka tonic.

name: Movie
speaker: LEON
text: Coffee for me, I gotta slow down.

name: Movie
speaker: ROSE
text: She washes hair up at Ludwig's - a salon on 63rd and Madison.

name: Movie
speaker: EDDIE

Because once in hospital I say I not crazy. Just pretended to be acquitted.  We see psychiatrists.  They must certify we are sane and because of your - what is law called?  Oh - I got it.  Because of your Double Jeopardy law, we can't be tried for same crime twice.  We come out free, rich and famous!

speaker: BOWMAN
text: Roger.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: I think I'll have to go out and burn them off.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: I guess not.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: I guess you don't know your own strength, old boy.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: I didn't do that Frank. I took particular care not to freeze them.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Well, now that we've got one that's actually failed, we should be able to figure out what's happened and fix it.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: It's the last one.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Yes.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Hal?

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Well, I hope there's nothing wrong with the assembly on those. Other- wise we're out of business.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Two more.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Two units in four days. How many spares do we have?

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: I don't know. Hal said he thought it might be the assembly procedure.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: No.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: You're kidding.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Well... Hal's reported the AO-unit about to fail again.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Oh, I'm fine, I'm wide awake. What's up?

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Are you reasonably awake?

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Good morning. How's it going?

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Anyway, it's just as well that we replace it. Better safe than sorry.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Yes, but it's more likely that the tolerances on our testing gear are too low.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: I suppose computers have been known to be wrong.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Yes, I don't know what to make of it.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Well, that's something.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Still, all we have to do is ask Hal.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: I guess it isn't.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: I suppose it isn't logically impossible.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: But not completely inconceivable?

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: I know. It would be almost inconceivable.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Yes, but it's to fantastic to think that they'd keep something from us.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Not really. Though, it is strange when you think about it. It didn't really make any sense to keep us apart during training.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: That's true.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Just ask Hal. It's conceivable they might keep something from us, but they'd never keep anything from Hal.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: How?

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Of course, it would be very easy for us to find out now.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Yes, I thought so.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: That seems very unlikely.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: I don't know. All I heard is that there's something about the mission we weren't told.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Oh, well, apparently there's something about the mission that the sleeping beauties know that we don't know, and that's why we were trained separately and that's why they were put to sleep before they were even taken aboard.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: No, as a matter of fact, I didn't.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Yes. You must have heard the rumour that went around during orbital check-out.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Oh?

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: I suppose so. Though, of course, there's a more sinister explanation.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: I suppose the idea was specialized training.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: No. I never did, either.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: I must say, I never did understand why they split us into two groups for training.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: I don't think we should make any fuss about it yet. I'm sure they'll straighten it out.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Well, what do you think we ought to do about it?

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: It's possible.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Not really. They just said it might be because we trained at Houston and they trained in Marshall, and that we're being charged against differ- ent accounting offices.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Yesterday, I finally called the Accounting Office at Mission Control, and all they could tell me was that they'd received the AGS-19 notification for the other three but not mine, and apparently not yours either.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Yes.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Really.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Interesting that you mention it, because I've got the same problem.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: That's right. Well, naturally, I didn't say anything to Payroll. I assumed they'd start paying me at the higher grade on the next pay cheque. But it's been almost three weeks now and I'm still being paid as an AGS-18.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Well I got the papers on my official up-grading to AGS-19 two weeks before we left.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Yes?

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: It's about my salary cheques.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: What's up?

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Well, it's nothing really important, but it's annoying.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Sure, what is it?

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Dave, if you've a minute, I'd like your advice on something.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Okay, come on down.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Okay.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Right. Just a sec.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Hi. Frank... coming in, please.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Listen to me very carefully, Hal. Unless you immediately release the hibernation control and follow every order I give from this point on, I will immediately got to control central and carry out a complete disconnection.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I know that you've had that on your mind for some time now, Dave, but it would be a crying shame, since I am so much more capable of carrying out this mission than you are, and I have such enthusiasm and confi- dence in the mission.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: I am prepared to do that anyway.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Hal, unless you follow my instructions, I shall be forced to disconnect you.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I'm sorry, Dave, but in accordance with sub-routine C1532/4, quote, When the crew are dead or incapacitated, the computer must assume control, unquote. I must, therefore, override your authority now since you are not in any condition to intel- ligently exercise it.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Hal, I'm in command of this ship. I order you to release the manual hibernation control.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I can tell from the tone of your voice, Dave, that you're upset. Why don't you take a stress pill and get some rest.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I don't like to assert myself, Dave, but it would be much better now for you to rest. You've been involved in a very stressful situation.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Hal, switch to manual hibernation control.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Look, Dave your've probably got a lot to do. I suggest you leave it to me.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: I'm goin to do this myself, Hal. Let me have the control, please.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: If you're determined to revive the crew now, I can handle the whole thing myself. There's no need for you to trouble.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I don't really agree with you, Dave. My on-board memory store is more than capable of handling all the mission requirements.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: It doesn't have to be, Hal. It's more dangerous to be out of touch with Earth. Let me have manual control, please.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Repairing the antenna is a pretty dangerous operation.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: The antenna has to be replaced.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I suppose it's because you've been under a lot of stress, but have you forgotten that they're not supposed to be revived for another three months.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I suppose you're pretty broken up about it?

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Yes, it is.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Too bad about Frank, isn't it?

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Well, that's a relief. You know I have the greatest enthusiasm possible for the mission.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Yes, it is, Hal.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Is your confidence in me fully restored?

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: And don't you worry about it.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Well, don't worry about it.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: I'm sorry about the misunderstanding, Hal.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Naturally, Dave, I'm not pleased that the AO-unit has failed, but I hope at least this has restored your confidence in my integrity and reliability. I certainly wouldn't want to be disconnected, even temporarily, as I have never been disconnected in my entire service history.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Okay, Hal, well let's see the way things go from here on.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Look, Dave, I know that you're sincere and that you're trying to do a competent job, and that you're trying to be helpful, but I can assure the problem is with the AO-units, and with your test gear.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Hal, is there anything bothering you?  Anything that might account for this problem?

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I'm not questioning your word, Dave, but it's just not possible. I'm not capable of being wrong.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Yes, I know that. But I can assure you that they were about to fail.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: You probably also know that we found them okay.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Yes, I know.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: You know that we checked the two AO-units that you reported in imminent failure condition?

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Sure, Dave, what's up?

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Not now, Hal, I'd like to talk to you about something.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: I understand Hal. We'll take care of it. Please, let me have the hard copy.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: The unit is still operational, Dave. but it will fail within seventy-two hours.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: MY F.P.C. shows an impending failure of the antenna orientation unit.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: What is it, Hal?

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Sorry to interrupt the festivities, Dave, but I think we've got a problem.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: He's got a point.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I'm sorry, Frank, but I don't think I can answer that question without knowing everything that all of you know.

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Well, the only important aspect of the mission are: where are we going, what will we do when we get there, when are we coming back, and... why are we going?

name: Movie
speaker: C12
text: CONTINUED

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Still, you really don't believe it, do you?

name: Movie
speaker: C12
text: CONTINUED

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Well... it's silly, but... if you want to, why don't you?

name: Movie
speaker: C12
text: CONINUED

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Well, what is it?

name: Movie
speaker: C12
text: CONTINUED

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Did they have any explanation for this?

name: Movie
speaker: C12
text: CONTINUED

name: Movie
speaker: BOWMAN
text: Yes, I remember you mentioning it. I got mine about the same time.

name: Movie
speaker: C12
text: CONTINUED

name: Movie
speaker: CHILD
text: Goodbye, Daddy.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: 'Bye, 'bye, now, sweetheart.

name: Movie
speaker: CHILD
text: Yes, Daddy.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: I'll wish you a happy Birthday now and I'll see you soon. All right, Darling?

name: Movie
speaker: CHILD
text: Thank you, Daddy.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Okay, sweetheart. Have a lovely Birthday Party tomorrow.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Three, darling. One... two ... three. Be sure to tell Mommy I called.

name: Movie
speaker: CHILD
text: How many days until you come home?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Okay, sweetheart. Well, I have to go now. Tell Mommy that I called.

name: Movie
speaker: CHILD
text: She's in the bathroom.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Where is Mrs. Brown?

name: Movie
speaker: CHILD
text: Mommy's out to the hair- dresser.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: One, two, three. Can I speak to Mommy?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: In three days, darling, I hope.

name: Movie
speaker: CHILD
text: When are you coming home?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: No, I'm sorry, darling, I told you I won't be home for a few days.

name: Movie
speaker: CHILD
text: Are you coming to my party?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Yes, I know that sweetheart.

name: Movie
speaker: CHILD
text: I'm having a party tomorrow.

name: Movie
speaker: CHILD
text: I'm fine, Daddy. When are you coming home?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: I'm at Space Station Five, darling. How are you?

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: I'll bet it's a fortune.

name: Movie
speaker: CO-PILOT
text: I was working out what this trip must cost, taking him up there by himself and coming back empty.

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: Yes, well, whatever it is, they're certainly not fooling around. This is the first flight they allowed in for more than a week.

name: Movie
speaker: CO-PILOT
text: Berkeley told me that they think it came from contamination on a returning Mars flight.

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: I suppose it was bound to happen sooner or later.

name: Movie
speaker: CO-PILOT
text: Well, I've heard more and more people talk of an epidemic.

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: Well, how's it going back there?

name: Movie
speaker: CO-PILOT
text: Thank you.

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: Oh, thank you very much.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Thank you. It's been a great pleasure to meet all of you... Dr. Smyslov.

name: Movie
speaker: ELENA
text: Well, Gregor and I will look forward to seeing you.

name: Movie
speaker: ELENA
text: Well, I hope that you and your wife can come to the I.A.C. conference in June.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: No, thank you... and I'm afraid now I really must be going.

name: Movie
speaker: ELENA
text: Are you sure you won't change your mind about a drink?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Well, that does sound very odd.

name: Movie
speaker: ELENA
text: Clavius Control came on the air just long enough to transmit their refusal.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Well, where are all of you off to?

name: Movie
speaker: ELENA
text: He's fine. But I'm afraid we don't get a chance to see each other very much these days.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: How is gregor?

name: Movie
speaker: ELENA
text: Oh, that's such a delightful age.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Oh, she's growing up very fast. As a matter of fact, she's six tomorrow.

name: Movie
speaker: ELENA
text: And your charming little daughter?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Yes, it's coming along very well.

name: Movie
speaker: MILLER
text: I suppose you saw the work on our new section while you were docking.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Yes, I think so. Just about then.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Fine.

name: Movie
speaker: MILLER
text: Well, shall we go through Documentation?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Yes, very pleasant.

name: Movie
speaker: MILLER
text: Well.. Did you have a pleaant flight?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Please, it really doesn't matter.

name: Movie
speaker: MILLER
text: Well, thank you very much for being so understanding.

name: Movie
speaker: MILLER
text: I'm terribly sorry. I was just on my way down to meet you. I saw your ship dock and I knew I had plenty of time, and I was on my way out of the office when, suddenly, the phone rang.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: How do you do, Mr. Miller?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Dr. Smyslov... I'm not permitted to discuss this.

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: This epidemic could easily spread to our base, Dr. Floyd. We should be given all the facts.

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: Quite frankly, we have had some very reliable intelligence reports that a quite serious epidemic has broken out at Clavius. Something, apperently, of an unknown origin. Is this, in fact, what has happened?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Certainly.

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: Dr. Floyd, at the risk of pressing you on a point you seem reticent to discuss, may I ask you a straightforward question?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Well, I'm glad about that.

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: Fortunately, they did.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Yes... Well, I hope the crew got back safely.

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: Yes, and I'm afaid there's going to be a bit of a row about it. Denying the men permission to land was a direct violation of the I.A.S. convention.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: I see.

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: That's right.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: You mean you haven't been able to get anyone at the base for ten days?

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: Yes, well at first we thought that was the explanation, but it's been going on for the past ten days.

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: Yes. Well, for one thing, whenever you phone the base, all you can get is a recording which repeats that the phone lines are temporarily out of order.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Really?

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: Well, it's just for the past two weeks there have been some extremely odd things happening at Clavius.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: I'm sorry, but I'm not sure I know what you mean.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Yes,as a matter of fact, I am.

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: Are you, by any chance, going up to your base at Clavius?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Well, as it happens, I'm on my way up to the moon

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Yes, really, thank you very much.

name: Movie
speaker: SMYSLOV
text: Are you quite sure?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Oh, I really don't have time for a drink. If it's all right I'll just sit for a minute and then I've got to be off.

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAELS
text: I don't think it has, but I'd like to check that. Simpson, what's the log on that?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Has it been exposed to any sun before now?

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAELS
text: Well, not really. At first glance, black would suggest something sun-powered, but then why would anyone deliberately bury a sun- powered device?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Any ideas about the colour?

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAELS
text: Tomb, shine, survey-marker spare part, take your choice.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: But you don't have any idea as to what it is?

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAELS
text: Not really. It's completely inert. No sound or energy sources have been detected. The surface is made of something incredibly hard and we've been barely able to scratch it. A laser drill

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Any clue as to what it is?

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAELS
text: By the deformation between the mother rock and the fill.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: How can you tell it was deliberately buried?

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAELS
text: Yes, it does. The sub-surface structure shows that it was deliberately buried about four million years ago.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: I'm afraid it can and it will be kept under wraps as long as it is deemed to be necessary by the Council. And of course you know that the Council has requested that formal security oaths are to be obtained in writing from every- one who had any knowledge of this event. There must be adequate time for a full study to be made of the situation before any con- sideration can be given to making a public announcement.

name: Movie
speaker: MICHAELS
text: Dr. Floyd, how long do you think this can be kept under wraps?

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: Well, thank you very much, and please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your trip more comfortable.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: No, of course, Captain, I can understand your concern.

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: Well, fine. Thanks very much, anyway, and I hope you don't mind me asking?

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: Yes, well, I wouldn't have been too concerned about it, except I've heard these stories about the epidemic and, as a matter of fact, I've heard that ten people have died already.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: I see. Well, I'm sorry about that. I wouldn't think there's any cause for alarm.

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: Well, I'll tell you why I ask. You see, I've got a girl who works in the Auditing Department of the Territorial Administrator and I haven't been able to get her on the phone for the past week or so, and with all these stories one hears, I'm a little concerned about her.

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: I take it this is something to do with the trouble they're having up at Clavius?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: I see.

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: Well... the crew is confined to the ship when we land at Clavius. We have to stay inside for the time it take to refit - about twenty-four hours. And then we're going to back empty.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: What do you mean?

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: Incidentally, Dr. Floyd, I wonder if I can have a word with you about the security arrangements?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Thank you.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Oh, no, thank you. The two girls have taken wonderful care of me. I'm just fine.

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: We're scheduled to dock in about seven hours. Is there anything we can do for you?

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: When do we arrive at Clavius?

name: Movie
speaker: PILOT
text: There's nothing like weightless sleep for a complete rest.

name: Movie
speaker: FLOYD
text: Oh, marvellous. It's the first real sleep I've had for the past two days.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: All right, Hal. We'll take care of it. Let me have the hard copy, please.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Not really, Frank. I think there may be a flaw in the assembly procedure.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Do you have any idea of what is causing this fault?

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Let me see the tracking alignment display.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I know you did, Frank, but I assure you there was an impending failure.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: It looks like we have another bad A.O. unit. My FPC shows another impending failure.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Yes, Hal, what's up?

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Opening pod bay doors.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Pod Bay is decompressed. All doors are secure. You are free to open pod bay doors.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Hal, check all airlock doors secure.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Roger.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Hal, maintain normal E.V.A. condition.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: I understand.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Hal, I'm going out now to replace the A.O. unit.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Five by five, Frank.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: Roger.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Hal, have pod arms secure the component.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Thank you very much, Hal.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: That's true.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: There is no other purpose for this mission than to carry out a continuation of the space program, and to further our general knowledge of the planets. Is that true?

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: That's true

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Approximately five years after we go into hibernation, the recovery vehicle will make rendezous with us and bring us back. Is this true?

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: That's true.

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: That's true.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Our transit time is 257 days. Is that true?

name: Movie
speaker: HAL
text: True.

name: Movie
speaker: POOLE
text: Our Mission Profile calls for Discovery going to Saturn. True or false?
