text: I got two problems.  Number one, I'm not playin' games.  Number two, you got nothin' to bet with.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Hey, you wanna bet?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: You need five years training to handle a joint like...

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: I been in a lot of bars where a white cop rousted me and some of the brothers. All those clowns ever had going for 'em was a gun and a badge...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Bullshit.  Attitude and experience get you through...

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: But you can handle it all right, huh? Real amazin' how far a gun and a badge can carry some cats...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: If they kick my ass, they'll sure as hell carve yours up...

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Back you up?  Now why would I wanna do that?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: This part of town, they'll make us for heat the second we walk in. Just back me up like you've got a piece...

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: It's a long shot, but...Billy used to tend bar here a few years back. I heard him talk about it.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Well?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: At least you took care of business and got the important part in before she came down on you...Tell me a little about her.  She got great tits?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Sure.  Then we had a fight this morning.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: You have a good time?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Last night.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Last night, two nights ago, three?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I don't give out the details.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Mission District.  Gonna find us an Indian.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Now, where we goin', convict?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: She's got the same complaint as half the Goddamn population.  She can't get the job she's trained for and it pisses her off... Anyway, what the fuck do you care?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: You really do have onoe, huh, Jack... what's her problem besides you?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Just get in the car and keep your mouth shut.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Who'd you call on the phone back at the booking station?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Yeah, I want mandolins, flowers... They move off down the corridor.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah, I'm hungry too. I know of a place. Let's go eat.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Bullshit ... I ain't moving  till I get something to eat. You've been treating me like shit ever since I came out here.  If you don't like it, you can take me back to the penitentiary and kiss my hungry black ass good-bye.  And I want some food some place nice.. Some good people, nice music...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: We eat when I say we eat.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Speakin' of moans my Stomach is startin' to growl.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah, well, my ass bleeds for you. And I didn't get you out so you could go on a Goddamn "trim" hunt... stop moaning.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Do you know how close I was to getting some trim.  And you fucked' it up.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: We're on the move. Let's go. As they walk toward a corridor.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: If you let him run around till Tuesday, he's gonna run right to Ganz and warn him. Ain't you, motherfucker?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: He's gotta take that call ... if there is one.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: I think you better put him on ice, man.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: What do you think?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Want to try it again?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Thank you.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Hey, this works pretty good.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Just throw me the Goddamn gun.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: I got a whole thing about people pointin' guns at me.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I'm tellin' you to drop the Goddam gun.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Quit playin' cop and undo this cuff, Jack, I need to talk to this man.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I'm helpin' you, huh?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Luther ain't the reliable type. I don't want you shot yet, Cates ... not before you been a help to me.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Your pal nuts enough to take a shot at me?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Just up the street, the other side, over there ... Now, don't bother knockin' on the door. Luther ain't the kind of guy that looks for company.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I may call you worse than that.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Then what're you complainin' about? At least nobody's calling you shithead....

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I don't give a damn.  It happens to be my name.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Just an expression man, don't mean nothin'.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I can read a police file, shithead, and quit calling me Jack.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: What gang you talkin' about, Jack?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Luther was part of the gang?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Don't worry, I got a move for ya. An awesome move. A guy named Luther. Ganz'll be paying him a visit.  We go to him right away.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Okay, let's get down to it.  I did my part and got you out.  So now you tell me where we're goin'?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: It looks like you bought it off one of the brothers.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Shit.  I'm already sorry.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Get this.  We ain't partners. We ain't brothers.  We ain't friends. I'm puttin' you down and keepin' you down until Ganz is locked up or dead.  And if Ganz gets away, you're gonna be sorry we ever met.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: No way to start a partnership.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: You just don't get it, do your Reggie?  There isn't any deal. I own your ass.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Hey, no way.  Take off the bracelets or no deal.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: You got a girl... shit... the generosityof women never ceases to amaze me.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I don't need to hear your jive. I already got that department taken care of...

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Listen, it may be a little out of date. You know, I got a reputation for lookingreal sharp with the ladies...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: We're supposed to be after a killer, not a string of hookers...

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: What are you talkin' about?  This suit's mine.  It cost $900.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: This prison gives out $400 suits?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I'll think about it.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: It's the only way you're gonna get Ganz.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Bullshit.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: I got a lot to protect.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: What's the big deal about you bein' on the street?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: I can help you, man, but you gotta get me out.  I got to be on the street.  Get me outta here.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: You're crazy.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: I can deliver Ganz.  But you gotta get me outta here first.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Didn't work out that way.  He busted out with a big Indian. They capped two guards on a road gang. Nice meeting you Reggie.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Ganz is in jail.  He's gonna be there two years after I'm on the street.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah, I noticed...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Not likely, Reggie.  Maybe I just need some help.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: You here to write my life story?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Sure, anything you want.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Try Cates.  And let's talk in private, okay?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: You got a name, cop?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I'm taking my prisoner back to jail.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Where the Christ do you think you're going?

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Just cause you say it with conviction don't mean shit to me... How you gonna take to a pink slip, huh?.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: He's got more brains and more guts in one corner of his asshole than any cop I've worked with.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Too bad, it would've covered your ass.  Now you're in the shit and so's the department. In case you haven't noticed, this wasn't our finest hour... I told you everyone was watchin' on this one. Maybe you better start thinkin' about writin' tickets off a three wheel bike.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I didn't have the time.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Don't duck the bullet Cates. Why didn't you call in for backup instead of makin' a grandstand play?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Right.  I screwed up.  I fucked up. I messed up.  Anybody could have done better, especially you. I bet you're real good at hitting targets through crowds.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: What a screw-up.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: You couldn't get to him?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: The Indian.  I was about 30 yards away.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Which one pulled the trigger?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: They ran.  As fast as they could. Caught a train.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: How did they get away?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I lost them, that's what happened.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: What the bell happened?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I'll keep it in mind.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Try not to get your ass shot to pieces. We got enough dead cops on this one.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah?

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Jack?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: You really know how to send a guy out with a great attitude. He starts to go.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Okay.  You're not a team player. You gotta do things your own way. Fine.  Nail this guy and make us all look good.  But you better watch your ass.  If you screw up, I can promise you, you're goin' down.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Being a hot dog's worked pretty well for me so far... Besides, I got a lead...

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: You might be more of a team player and a little less of a hot dog on this one, Jack.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah.  It bothers me when cops get hurt while I'm makin' a play. I don't like it.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Anthing botherin' you besides losin' your gun?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah...

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Jack, come on, there is an official department policy about cop killings. Cop killers represent a special priority because any man crazy enough to kill a cop is a greater threat to an unarmed civilian... In other words, we can't seen like we're in the revenge business... I know, we all know the truth's a little different.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Hey, the bastard's got my gun.  I want it back.

name: Movie
speaker: HADEN
text: Yeah, I read the report...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I want to be left alone on this one. Algren was killed with my gun.

name: Movie
speaker: YOUNG COP
text: I guess when two cops die on account of your fuck up you want to keep it as quiet as possible...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Are you gonna tell me about police procedure?  Do me a favor, don't give me a bunch of crap.

name: Movie
speaker: YOUNG COP
text: Somebody steals your gun, you're supposed to file a report.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: The truth hurts, doesn't it, buddy?

name: Movie
speaker: YOUNG COP
text: But that's what you say about all of us all the tine ... we're always the ones fucking up when you tell it...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah.

name: Movie
speaker: YOUNG COP
text: That's what you say, Cates...

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: I'm not paid to take your personal calls.  He was in some bar. .. off duty.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Jesus Christ.  Why the hell didn't you tell me before?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: I almost forgot.  That pal of yours from the Vice Squad wants you to call him.

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: Okay.  See you in the morning... you know, you ought to get some rest...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I got to wait for a call.

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: I'm heading out. How about you?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Bullshit red tape.

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: Nothing.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Nothing came in for me yet?  No calls?

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: Doesn't look like it.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Aw, bullshit, you heard wrong.

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: Long night, too, from what I heard ... Word's going around that in addition to losing Ganz for the second time, and in addition to Haden busting you back to Patrolman, some jig beat the crap out of you.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: So do you...been a long day.

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: You look awful.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: One of  em's in the slam.

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: Here's the file. Cates checks the file.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I think I wanna have a discussion about it with any of the ones still walking.  Can we find them?

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: Hey ... Dick Tracy.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Tell me that's not the same guy.

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: Uhh ... Wong, Henry Wong.  He was in on the same job.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Wait a minute, wait a minute... who's this?

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: They all pulled a bunch of jobs with Ganz about four years ago.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Who are all these?

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: Backup man from the East Bay. Worked with Ganz a few years ago and sprung him from the road gang.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Billy Bear...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Shit.

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: This guy must have had a .44 like yours, Jack. Now he's got yours.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I'll help you out.

name: Movie
speaker: KEHOE
text: Every last bit of it.  The big guy's room was empty.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Is that what this guy Ganz had in the hotel?

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: I dunno ... he's gonna call me...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: When? How?

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: He ... he wants me to help him skip town.

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: I don't know.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I think I met her.  Now tell us something we don't know, like where they stashed her.

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: Ganz and Billy got my girl, Rosalie.

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: Who gives a fuck what you think?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: You just took a shot at me, asshole. I think you do know where he is.

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: Haven't seen him for years. That's the truth.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I sure ain't his fairy godmother... now I'm looking for Ganz...where is he?

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: A cop...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: That's what I always say.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: You're impossible...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: He's takin' care of the same business I'll be takin' care of - soon as I dry off.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Tell me.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Promised I'd turn my back while he... ah, never mind...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Where is he?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Three more hours...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah, bein' a hard-ass all the time is a real drag, but it works.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I've been waiting a long time to hear you say that.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Usual bullshit.  You make one smart move and everybody wants to be your friend... You know somethin', shootin' guys sucks. Especially compared to this.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: How'd they take it back at headquarters?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Let's go, Reggie.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: What do I know?  I'm just a bartender.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Whaddya think?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Oh, yeah, well look where you came when you were down and out.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Hey, Come on, shrink time's over. They wouldn't go see some old girlfriend.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: When a guy hurts you, then comes back bleeding on his hands and knees, who knows, he might just be irrestible.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: So what?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: It might pay to reexamine a few of your more primitive notions.  I was in bed with a girlfriend watching TV last week, Jack, and one thing we know about me is I happen not to be a lesbian ... Now, if this Indian's girlfriend got upset when you came looking for him, it could just be she's still vulnerable to him.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Come on, they were a little old for a slumber party.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: What makes you think they were lesbians, or as you so quaintly put it, dykes?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Jack, it's all over the papers. He's an obvious type.  But this Indian...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: How do you know?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Ganz is going to be hard to track. Just a pure schizo ... wires all crossed... totally without any pattern... kill anybody... The Indian... himself... anybody...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Nothing.  No sign of Ganz.  No sign of the Indian.  Airport's clean.  Train station. Bus station.  Docks... Shit...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I've been better...Dead end.  No Ganz, no Indian.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: You real down?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: We and my pal here have been taking it on the chin for the last few hours...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I can see that.  Pardon me for saying so, but you look like shit.  What happened?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Don't.  We've had a hard night.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I ought to have you and your friend thrown out...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Hiya, kid.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Hey, I don't believe it.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Fuck you.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Hi, it's me...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Hello.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Just a second, that's all!

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Jack, wait...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Elaine, I gotta put you on hold...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Jack?  What was that?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: The number ... what's the Goddamn number?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: So am I.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: No, it's I'm just surprised you called.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: No wonder you're so popular.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Elaine! I... I'm sorry... I was expecting somebody else... police business.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I'm at work, asshole.  Where else?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: This is not the way people who care for each other are supposed to behave.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Listen, Goddamn it if you think I'm happy about it, you're nuts. I just gotta take care of a few things, okay?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Elaine, look, I'm in the middle of sone stuff right now... I'm not gonna have time to come by. I don't know when I can get there.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Just one.  Some lady called.  Said she's a little hot-headed sometimes... But she still wants her occasional roommate. She'd like to talk it over after she gets off work tonight... if it's humanly possible....

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I get that. The job first. Everything else, especially me, second. I get it. I don't like it.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: That's right.  I'm not like you. I'm not gonna sit on my ass wondering what's right and what's wrong... There's a psycho out there killing people with my gun and I'm gonna get him.  Because it's my job. And if you don't get that...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Here it comes again ... the sacred job...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I didn't get burned, two cops did. Listen, I'll tell you about personnel responsibility.  I like to get the job done right.  And if I don't get my job done right... I'm for shit.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Look, Jack, if you make everything your personal responsibility, you'll turn into a bad cop.  It's not a practical way to function...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Bullshit?  I'll tell you about bullshit.  My gun's a real weapon in the hands of a real maniac who knows how to use it.  It isn't my macho bullshit that's killing people, my gun is ...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Look, spare me the macho bullshit about your gun...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Sure, okay, fine, no problem... See, there's this kid in jail ... First thing I got to do is go up and see what he knows ...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Jack, are you okay?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah, Guess it must have been a slow news day...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: You made the front page.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Yeah, one of my favorites.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Great place for lunch.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Guess people ought to know who I am...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I think you forgot this. Hands him his wallet and badge...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Thanks for the coffee.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Yeah, for some reason, I'm sure...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: You sure you want me to?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Call me later.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: That's the way I see it, too.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: You know something, Jack, you really are hopeless.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I wish you'd stop trying to make me mad so I won't care for you... I wish you'd give me a little more of a chance.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: What do you want to know?  What difference does it make?  I'm the guy in your bed the last three months.  I make you feel good. You make me feel good.  What the hell else do you want from a guy?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: When you start with that attitude... it's like I don't know who you are.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Maybe you don't know what the hell you're talking about.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Maybe that makes a nice excuse.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Maybe I got a fairly crummy day ahead.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: That's a fairly crummy way to start a morning.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Maybe I would if I knew when you were coming back.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Maybe you ought to buy me one.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: What makes you think I have any clean shirts at my place?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: You know, if you let me come over to your place once in a while, you could put on a clean shirt in the morning.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I think you're ashamed to tend bar which is sad because you look great in that outfit they make you wear... You pull down four bills a week which is damn good, and you mix the best Pina Coladas I've ever had... I think that if you need bigger and better things ... then go for em.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Tell me--I'm dyin' to hear it.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Hey, you know what I really think?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: If this is your idea of sympathetic interest in my problems, I'll take brutal indifference.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I do think all psychotherapy is bullshit. But just because I think it's bullshit doesn't mean I don't know something about it.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Aren't you the one that thinks all psychotherapy is bullshit?

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Positive self-image problem all over again ... You are who you decide you are unless you're the type that lets assholes decide for you.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Then I sit back and I think, I mean, who's to say I'm not a dumb bitch.  I work in a bar, right? I can't read a list of my academic credentials to every booze-hound that comes in the place... You are what you do...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I guess he got the message...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Irrigated his face with the shot of J and B I'd just poured him. Then I tried to deck the sucker.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: What'd you do?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: A guy in the bar called me a dumb bitch today.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: What's wrong with that?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I'm all wet.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: That's the way I see it, too.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: You're hopeless.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: Hey, you're right.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I still don't think it's loaded.

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: This is a .44 Magnum, the most powerful handgun in the world. You gotta ask yourself just one question. Are you feelin' lucky?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I don't think your gun's loaded...

name: Movie
speaker: CATES
text: I don't answer questions, I ask 'em...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: What am I wanted for?

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: In all due respect, he sounds kind of pathetic to me.  The kind of guy that runs home to his momma or some girlfriend.  Have you two ace detectives checked that out?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: He was the only one of my bunch that was my friend... He was loyal, went all the way for you...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: That's no bull.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Hey, two days with him is enough.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: How would you know?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Hard man to live with.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Shrink major, not a shrink.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Well, I been workin' the other side of the street for the last few years.  And you don't exactly look like a shrink, wearin' that dress...

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: I'm not so sure I can say the same thing...You don't look like a cop.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Name's Hammond, Reggie Hammond. I heard a lot about you. And any friend of Jack's is a friend of mine.

name: Movie
speaker: ELAINE
text: Who the hell are you?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Alright, I'm coming...hold on.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: Keep stallin'.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: What do you want?

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: Stall.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: Shut up.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: What do you want?  What's goin' on?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: What the hell's wrong?  I didn't do anything.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: Shut up.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Hey...

name: Movie
speaker: HENRY
text: Sure, right.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: We'll follow you.  Take it slow,okay?

name: Movie
speaker: HENRY
text: Yeah, old times.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: We got a lot to talk about.

name: Movie
speaker: HENRY
text: Can't complain.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: How ya doin'?

name: Movie
speaker: HENRY
text: Hot?  Hey, they're not even room temperature.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: How hot are they?

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: What are you talkin' about? I said I wouldn't hurt her.

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: Rosalie, you okay?

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: First, the money.

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: Let her go.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: You try to mess with us or go to the cops, I promise you, I'll put holes in her you wouldn't believe.

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: Come on, you can trust me. Please.

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: Honest. The place we stashed it opens Monday morning. I can't get it till then. Monday morning, that's when it opens. After that, I'll get the money to you right away...

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: You chickenshit punk...

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: I can't get it until Monday. Honest.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: When?

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: No! Don't kill her.  I can get you the money.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: Billy, go ahead, break it...

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: Don't give me this, we were partners.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: Instead of worryin' about Reggie, you better worry about me...

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: You want that Indian to snap her neck?

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: I don't know what you're talkin' about.

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: I want the money, asshole, what do you think?  The money that Reggie hid...

name: Movie
speaker: LUTHER
text: Whaddya want?  I thought you were locked up-

name: Movie
speaker: GANZ
text: Surprise, Luther.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: I'll got your money to you. No sweat.

name: Movie
speaker: SOSNA
text: Fuck you.  You got no right for this kind of play.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Try and take it.

name: Movie
speaker: SOSNA
text: Give it back.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Yeah, I know that, but this is me and we're old friends. I haven't got the money so what are you gonna do about it?

name: Movie
speaker: SOSNA
text: This ain't a credit business.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Five.  On credit.

name: Movie
speaker: SOSNA
text: Five bills.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Don't mess with me. How much?

name: Movie
speaker: SOSNA
text: This is clean shit.  No serial numbers and never been used...

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: How much?

name: Movie
speaker: SOSNA
text: It's loaded... I got some shells in here.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: How about some ammo?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: I'm sure.  Everybody here's looking at everybody else's ass.

name: Movie
speaker: SOSNA
text: You sure?

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: Naw, right here's okay.

name: Movie
speaker: SOSNA
text: You want to go outside?

name: Movie
speaker: SOSNA
text: Not bad, not bad.

name: Movie
speaker: HAMMOND
text: How you doing, man?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: I can't pretend to be your husband... David's in great shape.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Akta dedero ansila do mektet.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: No, I'm not proud of myself... But we don't have the luxury of choice.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Vano da, mechteba?! Soun domo kala chon hammas!

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: You know exactly where they are!

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Ikset-kiba.  Me imanetaba oum dalat!

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: The case was stolen?

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: San Agamat chay bet... envolet!

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: The case..with the stones... Where is it?

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Napoleon... small.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: What're you laughing about?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: At your service.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Corn-i-Lius?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Appipulai Leeloo Minai..

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: I know...

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: You are a monster, Zorg!

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Let me reassure you Father..I will never kill more people in my entire life than religion has killed in the last 2000 years.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Destroying a glass is one thing..killing people with the weapons you produce is quite another.

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Father, by creating a little destruction, I am, in fact, encouraging life!  So, in reality, you and I are in the same business!

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: They are robots!

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: ...Look at all these little things... so busy all of a sudden. Notice how each one is useful. What a lovely ballet, so full of form and color.  So full of..life!

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Follow me.. Life, which you so nobly serve, comes from destruction. Look at this empty glass.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: No thank you.

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: ...would you like a drink?

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Ah, Father... You are so wrong. Let me explain...

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: ...I'm a priest! I'm here to serve life, All you want to do is destroy it.

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Why?  What's wrong with me?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Even it I did know where the stones were I would never tell somebody like you.

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Personally, they are of no interest to me, I'd rather sell weapons..but I have a customer... so tell me...

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: ...Why on earth do the stones interest you?

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: I'm glad you got your memory back, Father... Because you're going to need it... Where are the stones?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: I remember you now..the so called art dealer.

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Zorg. Jean-Baptiste Emmanuel Zorg... nice to see you again

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: I'm fucked!

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: ...We're saved!

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: That's what I'm saying.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: And you don't know how they open, is that what you are saying?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Yes, of course, but... The Stones are shut! They have to be open for it to work.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: There's no light! You told me there were supposed to be four beams of light.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Theoretically, yes! The four Stones form the beam and the Fifth Element is supposed to stand in the middle there, but... I don't have the reference book. I've never seen the Stones work!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Don't tell me you don't know how all this works?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Uh.. Have you tried the Diva's suite?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: When is she not in trouble?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Leeloo's in trouble?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Yeah, I know... to save the world... but right now all I want to do is save Leeloo.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: You're probably very angry with me and I quite understand. But I want you to know I'm fighting for a noble cause.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Trying to save your ass so you can save the world.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: What are you doing?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Father, I was in the Army for awhile and every time they told us we were on a mission to save the world the only thing that changed was I lost a lot of friends. So thanks for the offer.. but no thanks.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Of course.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Good luck..

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: We have to save the world.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: What kind of mission?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: We're not going on vacation..we're on a mission..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Is that the usual way priests go on vacation?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: I'm sorry to have to resort to such methods, but we heard about your good luck on he radio and we need the tickets to Fhloston.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: That's what I thought.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: It means, "Never without my permission".

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Excuse me! Just one thing!  She said something to me a while ago and... I don't really get it... Akta Gamat?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I know. I was there when she arrived.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: She's fine, really..don't you worry.. just needs some rest..she's had a very long trip.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I might call to check up on her, you know... to see if she's better?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Yes. That's fine! Thank you very much. A thousand times over!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Dallas. Korben Dallas.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Thank you so much for your help Mr...?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: She's an exception..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: They all like this in your family, father?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Uh yes, we're cousins..distant cousins..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: So you do know her.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: There's not a moment to lose! Wake her up, but be gentle about it!  This woman is mankind's most precious possession! She is... perfect!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You noticed...

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: He's a she!

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: The girl?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I brought the girl remember?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Who are you?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: She dropped in on me... holding this.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: That's me.  But I don't know who she is... where did you find her?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: She's not my bride, she's my fare. She's looking for this Vito Cornelius. According to the phone guide he lives here.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Weddings are one floor down. Congratulations.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Excuse me, I'm looking for a priest.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: This is government business now. You ought to go home and get some rest, Father.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: What are we going to do?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Thank you, Mr. President.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: Did you see that..thing..swallow our battleship like a gum drop?  You can't even tell me what it is! I ask you for options you give me bullshit. Give them permission to enter our territories with my warmest regards.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: White turns to black.  Light to Dark. Life to Death.  For all eternity.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: But what happens if instead of this... Ultimate Warrior... it is EVIL who stands here?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Yes..thank God..

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: Is there anything that can stop it?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: And then it will be too late. The goal of evil is to wipe out life! All forms of life. For all eternity...Life upsets it.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: And then?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: We have forty-eight hours, the time it needs to adapt itself to our living conditions.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: That's exactly what we are going to try and do: Protect the lives of some 200 billion of our fellow citizens! General? You may fire when ready.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Time is of no importance, Mr. President. Only life is important.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: Your theory is interesting Father but I don't think we have time to go into it right now!

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: One more reason to shoot first eh?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Imagine for a moment that this. thing is not anything that can be identified because it prefers not to be, because it is the antithesis of all we are. Because it is evil.. TOTAL EVIL.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Later, David! Later! There's not a minute to lose!

name: Movie
speaker: DAVID
text: You're all safe. Thanks be to God!

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: It's all my fault.  I'm the servant... It's my mission! Here!

name: Movie
speaker: DAVID
text: On the plane... with Mr. Dallas... the real one.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Where's Leeloo?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Good work, my son.  Now all we need is a way to get there.

name: Movie
speaker: DAVID
text: I got it!  Everything  here we need to know about Fhloston Paradise Hotel... and a detailed blueprint of the entire hotel!

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Perfect.

name: Movie
speaker: DAVID
text: They really made her...

name: Movie
speaker: DAVID
text: I didn't know your size.

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: There was this guy with a limp who came a month ago..said he was an art dealer ... Asking all these questions about the Sacred Stones..at the time I didn't think anything of it.. What was his name? I'm so bad with names...

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Yes. Of course..

name: Movie
speaker: DAVID
text: Uh father, I know she's been through a lot... but the sacred stones..we don't have much time..

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Learning our history! The last 5000 years that she missed! She's been out of circulation a while, you know.

name: Movie
speaker: DAVID
text: What's she doing?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: Absolutely sure There's the triple suns on her gloves!

name: Movie
speaker: DAVID
text: Father.  You sure she's the Supreme Being?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: The Supreme Being, the fifth element is here, in our parish!!! It's a miracle!!!

name: Movie
speaker: DAVID
text: Father, will you please explain what's going on?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: I can't wear these clothes! This calls for dignity! I have to dress the part!

name: Movie
speaker: DAVID
text: What is?

name: Movie
speaker: CORNELIUS
text: It's a miracle!!!

name: Movie
speaker: DIVA
text: They are... with me...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I'm sorry, but... the Stones...

name: Movie
speaker: DIVA
text: I would like to have died in peace...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Listen, the last time I admitted to a woman I loved her ... I never saw her again.

name: Movie
speaker: DIVA
text: I don't have time... I need to know.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I... I don't know! We hardly know each other... it takes time!

name: Movie
speaker: DIVA
text: Do you love her?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I'll help her, I promise, but I think you should tell me where the Stones are!

name: Movie
speaker: DIVA
text: She was taught to love the life of others... but not her own. You have to teach her to love if you want her to truly live!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: ...So Cornelius was telling the truth!

name: Movie
speaker: DIVA
text: Yes, and more than that... You must give her the Stones, she's the only one who knows how to use them.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Leeloo... is... she's...

name: Movie
speaker: DIVA
text: The Fifth Element... The Supreme Being... Your wife...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Who?

name: Movie
speaker: DIVA
text: You're a good man... She was right to have chosen you...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Leeloo..

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: Uh huh..and I don't suppose you got the name of this..perfect fare..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: 5'7", green eyes... long legs... great skin... perfect..

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: So, just how big was this fare?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Finger..man..I'm sorry..listen..I was on the way over but I had a fare fall into my lap.. y'know one of those big fares you just can't resist..

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: Hey bud...I'm waiting all day here.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Hello?

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: In your dreams! See you tonight!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Uh... at least fifty.

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: How many points you got left on your license?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Finger!  I'm driving a cab now, not a space fighter!!

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: You forgetting who sat next to you for a thousand missions. I know how you drive.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I don't need one.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Like shit.

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: How do I look?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I just found a picture of you.

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: Don't exist bud.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I don't want a million - I just want one.  A perfect one.

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: You still pining for that two timing bitch. Forget her. There are a million women out there.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: At least, the cat comes back.

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: Oh, yeah, I forgot.You still prefer your cat to the real thing.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I was talking to the cat.

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: I love you too Major, but you haven't called me that since basic training.

name: Movie
speaker: FINGER
text: Hey bud! Finger here.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Yeah?

name: Movie
speaker: GIRL
text: ...Leeloo.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Hey,  that's... cute... Do you have a nickname, something a little... shorter?

name: Movie
speaker: GIRL
text: Leeloo Minai Lekarariba-Laminai-Tchai Ekbat De Sebat.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: ...What's your name?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I'm sorry, it's just that... I was told to wake you up gently, so I figured...

name: Movie
speaker: GIRL
text: Eto Akta Gamat!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Vito Cornelius?

name: Movie
speaker: GIRL
text: Vito... Cor... Ni-lious... Priest...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You're not that bad... Come on we'll get you to a doctor.

name: Movie
speaker: GIRL
text: ...Priest...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: It there's one thing I don't need advice on, it's how to drive.

name: Movie
speaker: GIRL
text: Daya deo dono Dato.  Dalutan!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: ...'Scuse me?

name: Movie
speaker: GIRL
text: Akina delutan, nou-shan.

name: Movie
speaker: PRIEST
text: We will be ready, Lord.

name: Movie
speaker: KOMMANDER
text: When EVIL returns so shall we.

name: Movie
speaker: KOMMANDER
text: Time is of no importance, only life is important.

name: Movie
speaker: PRIEST
text: Knowing mankind as I do, that could take centuries!

name: Movie
speaker: KOMMANDER
text: When mankind comes to its senses. We will return.

name: Movie
speaker: PRIEST
text: Will the elements be gone now forever from this place?

name: Movie
speaker: KOMMANDER
text: Take them and put them in a safe place.

name: Movie
speaker: PRIEST
text: The Fifth Element...

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Don't you ever ask me for another thing in my life again, you've killed your poor mother with your own hands!

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: You little sleaze bag!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Hello?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: ...Not yet.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Have you pulled yourself together?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Yeah?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: They've been blaring out your name on the radio for the last hour, blockhead!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Ma. If I'd won, I'd know about it. Someone would have notified me.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: You just won a trip, you dolt! Ten days in Fhloston Paradise for two!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: All I want is an explanation! I just got in, I lost my job. I smashed my cab. I got mugged, but other than that everything's peachy, Ma, thanks for asking!! Now settle down and explain to me calmly..

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: I get it! You want to make me beg, is that it?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I'm coming!. Ma, what're you talking about?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: ...And now you're making fun of me? I'm warning you! If you don't take me after all these years of sacrifice, I'll never forgive you!!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Other than that... You all right?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Yes ma..

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Are you listening to me, you ingrate!

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: I've been playing twice a week for 20 years, 20 years I've been eating those shitty croquettes.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Hi Ma...

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: You're the nastiest dirtbag I know in this stinking City!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: ...Hello?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Found it?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Anyone know how to release the lines on this crate?

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: 30 seconds...

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: This is a police control action..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I'm sorry..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Thanks for reminding me..

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: You have nine points left on your license..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I had the worst goddamn nightmare.

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: Fuel level 6.03..Propulsion 2x4...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: How you doing this morning?  Sleep OK? I didn't.

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: Welcome on board Mr. Dallas..

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: Yeah... then I sighed... like this.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Is that all?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Look, you did something that set it off. Try to remember. Concentrate. Tell me exactly what you did!!

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: Nothing! Swear to God, I didn't do nothing!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: What did you say? What did you do?

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: Dear listeners, your favorite DJ is alive and kicking. It's seven o'clock and time for the news. Tune in tomorrow for another adventure.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Solid little jobs, aren't they?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Fuck it! Hold tight!

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: I don't even know what I'm looking for!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: It's like a cab isn't it?

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: You know how to fly this thing?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I'll be right back.

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: Like Korben, can I have 30 seconds of your time here?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Not without Leeloo.

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: Maybe we oughta be going, what do you think?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: We got to find the leader. Mangalores don't fight without a leader.

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: He's on vacation.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Six to the left. One to the right.

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: Got it...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You don't do what I say... I'll waste you myself. Got it?

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: I didn't have a dad... never saw him... never even heard him. 50 billion people listen to me every day... and he doesn't hear me...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Yeah, very big, a giant.

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: ...You got brothers and sisters? What about your dad? Tell me about your dad! What was he like? Physically? Big, I suppose?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I don't think this is a good time...

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: Oh, yes! Do that! You treat me right, man. Tell me all about yourself, your roots, your personal life, your childhood dreams...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I'll take you to the bar, after that, you're on your own.

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: My main man! Please don't leave me here alone. My head's killing me and my adoring fans are gonna tear me apart! Get me outta here!

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: Crystal.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I didn't come here to play Dumbo on the radio. So tomorrow between 5 and 7 give yourself a hand, that clear pal?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Uh... not really.

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: ...Quiver ladies, he's gonna set the world on fire right here from 5 to 7! You'll know everything there is to know about the D-man. His dreams, his desires, his most intimate of intimates.  And from what I'm looking at intimate is the stud muffin's middle name. So tell me my main man... you nervous in the service?

name: Movie
speaker: LOC RHOD
text: Does it get any better or what!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Oh, yes you will...

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Three of us will never fit in there!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: ...Sorry, General, but we've got no choice! It'll only take a minute! Let me set up another meeting and I'll be back.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I mean my future.. my ex.. My future ex.. if she sees you here I'm finished.  She hates you guys. It's what killed us in the first place. Please...

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: I thought you were divorced.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: It's my wife.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: What is it?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: ...Shit!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: One reason... I want to stay the only one left alive.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Why not?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I'm not going.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Old tricks are the best tricks eh?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You couldn't come up with something a little more discreet?

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: You have won the annual Gemini contest and a trip to Fhloston Paradise. For two. Congratulations. Here are your tickets.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I've had enough good news for today

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Don't you open your messages?

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: You're the only one left alive...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: And the third one?

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Two: Of all the members of your unit you were the most highly decorated.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Three reasons... One: As part of The Elite Special Forces Unit of the Federated Army you are an expert in the use of all weapons and spacecraft needed for this mission.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Just one... why me?

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: You're to leave immediately for Fhloston Paradise. Retrieve four Stones from the Diva Plavalaguna. And bring them back with the utmost discretion as possible. Any questions'?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Where have I heard this song before?

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: To save the world.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: What mission?

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Major Dallas, if our calculations are correct you still have 57 hours owed to the Federal Army on your enlistment which is more than you will need for a mission of the utmost importance.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I love you...

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Tell me...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Because...

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Why?... Why would you need me?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Yes, you do! I need you. More than you can imagine! Stand up straight!

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: I have thousands of memories but none of them are mine... There is no need for me other than this. I'm immortal but I have no life.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: But I don't know love... I'm like a machine programmed to save other people's lives but never to have one of my own.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Exactly.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: ...Like love...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You're right but there are lots of good things... beautiful things...

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: What's the use of saving lives... when you see what you do with them!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Leeloo! Listen to me! I'll take you on a vacation afterwards! A real vacation, this time, for as long as you want. Come on! You can do it!

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: I want to sleep... forever...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You can sleep tomorrow... come on...

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: I'm so tired...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: It's up to you now, Angel!

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: ...The rain falls...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I know all that, Leeloo! I'm talking about the Stones.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: The wind blows... the fire burns...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Leeloo? The Stones! We have to open them! How does it work?

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Protect life... Until death.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I told you not to read all that crap!

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Five hundred wars... Arms... Drugs... Money... Everything you create is used to destroy...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Why? We did pretty well, wouldn't you say?

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: I'm so very sad.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: The words you're looking for weren't in the dictionary you studied. I won't be long.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: You're nothing but a... a...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: It's difficult.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: And you can't concentrate with me around?.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I told you I need to work in peace. Remember? I need to concentrate.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: No, not at all!  I mean, just the opposite, you're... you're beautiful!

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: I'm going to see the Diva sing. What's the matter?... Do I look bad?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Where you going?

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: OK, you can turn around!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You noticed..

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Yes... you know there's a lot of differences between men women.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You get that off the screen?

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: You know women normally change five times more than men.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Here we go again...

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: ...Hoppi-hoppa.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Uh...

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Good! Do you know how we say "make love"?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Apipoussan?

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Apipoussan!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I know how to say "Hello". Teach me how to say "Good-bye", that's all I need.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Yes! Now it's your turn! I learned your language, you have to learn mine!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You learned 900 languages in five minutes?!

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: All 900.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Which one?

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Learning language.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Finished what?

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: What is... Make Love?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Sometimes you can't learn everything from a screen..sometimes it's better to ask someone who has experience..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Yes! But "love" isn't the operative word here, PEACE is!

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Love...

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Not hard to find you...just follow the Chaos...

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Apipoulai!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Took the words right out of my mouth. Go on... I'll be right with you.  It's our honeymoon. We're going to use the trip to get to know each other better.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Dinoine chagantakat!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Oh god!

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Cornelius..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You hear that?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Uh..you're welcome.

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Valo massa... Chacha hamas.

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I suppose that means "Hi" ?

name: Movie
speaker: LEELOO
text: Apipoulai!

name: Movie
speaker: THAI
text: Good philosophy..see good in bad.. I like..I prepare number one dessert.. special for you and pussy..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: At least I won lunch.

name: Movie
speaker: THAI
text: You right that is bad.. but mathematically luck must change! Grandfather say: "It never rain every day." This is good news guarantee.. I bet you lunch!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: The last two messages I got?  The first one was from my wife telling me she was leaving! And the second was from my lawyer telling me he was leaving too... with my wife.

name: Movie
speaker: THAI
text: How someone strong like you scared from a message? Is good news I sure!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: I've never gotten a message that wasn't bad news.

name: Movie
speaker: THAI
text: Not going to open?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You're welcome..

name: Movie
speaker: MUGGER
text: Thanks..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You gotta push the little yellow button...

name: Movie
speaker: MUGGER
text: It's not?

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: You know you could hurt someone with this puppy..good thing it's not loaded..

name: Movie
speaker: MUGGER
text: Uh..

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Isn't that a Z140? Alleviated titanium. Neuro charged assault model?

name: Movie
speaker: MUGGER
text: Don't fuck with me man or I'll blow you into tomorrow!

name: Movie
speaker: KORBEN
text: Been here long?

name: Movie
speaker: MUGGER
text: The cash man!

name: Movie
speaker: MACTILBURGH
text: It's an honor to receive you. Mr. President.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Mr. President, let me introduce you to Professor Mactilburgh, who runs the center.

name: Movie
speaker: MACTILBURGH
text: An elephant couldn't crack it.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: This thing solid?

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Wonderful!

name: Movie
speaker: MACTILBURGH
text: ...This is the crucial phase, The reconstruction of pigment. Cells are bombarded with slightly greasy solar atoms which forces the body cells to react, to protect themselves. That means growing skin. Clever, eh?

name: Movie
speaker: MACTILBURGH
text: We put it through the cellular hygiene detector. The cell is for lack of a better word... perfect.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Is there any danger? Some kind of virus?

name: Movie
speaker: MACTILBURGH
text: The compositional elements of his DNA chain are the same as ours, there are simply more of them tightly packed. His knowledge is probably limitless..

name: Movie
speaker: MACTILBURGH
text: Yes... I can't wait to meet him.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Sounds like a freak of nature to me.

name: Movie
speaker: MACTILBURGH
text: This cell is like a huge library. It has infinite genetic knowledge stored inside. Almost like it was...engineered.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Talk English Doc.

name: Movie
speaker: MACTILBURGH
text: It's not that easy..we've never encountered anything like it before..you see normal human beings have 40 DNA memo groums..which is more than enough for any species to perpetuate itself..This one has 200,000.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Have you identified it?

name: Movie
speaker: MACTILBURGH
text: Actually only one cell survived..

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: This is all that survived?

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: How much time is left?

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: They just landed in the desert.

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: Don't worry, Sir. I have the perfect one.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: I want your best man on this!

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: ...What do you mean?

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: The-Stones weren't aboard the ship.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: And the Stones?  Did you find them in the wreckage?

name: Movie
speaker: MUNRO
text: I managed to contact the Mondoshawan. They deplore the incident, but accept our apologies.

name: Movie
speaker: STAEDERT
text: I'm about to, Mr. President.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: Staedert?  What's going on?  Did you destroy it?

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: Gentlemen?

name: Movie
speaker: STAEDERT
text: My philosophy Mr. President is shoot first ask questions later. I don't like uninvited guests.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: Recommendations.

name: Movie
speaker: STAEDERT
text: Wait or act.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: Options.

name: Movie
speaker: STAEDERT
text: Not yet Sir..The only thing we know is it just keeps getting bigger!

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: What you are saying is you don't know what this..thing..is.

name: Movie
speaker: STAEDERT
text: There are no results from the chemical and molecular analysis as of yet, all the calibers are overshot..we're hoping a thermo nucleatic imaging..

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: I have to address the Supreme Council in 10 minutes. Just the facts, General.

name: Movie
speaker: STAEDERT
text: Perfect, Mr. President.

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: Is that better?

name: Movie
speaker: STAEDERT
text: I can hear you, Mr. President, but I can't see you .

name: Movie
speaker: PRESIDENT
text: Staedert, do you read me?

name: Movie
speaker: PROFESSOR
text: To fame.. salud..

name: Movie
speaker: PRIEST
text: Drink!

name: Movie
speaker: PRIEST
text: Then let us toast to your fame!  Here Billy..

name: Movie
speaker: PROFESSOR
text: A weapon against evil.  Amazing!  I am going to be famous.

name: Movie
speaker: PRIEST
text: Only too well... here you must be parched..

name: Movie
speaker: PROFESSOR
text: Father.. it in the most extraordinary thing.. the greatest find in history..can you imagine the implications.

name: Movie
speaker: PRIEST
text: Amen..

name: Movie
speaker: PROFESSOR
text: "..in which all the history of the Universe resides ..all the strength..all the hope..Protect us from Evil.."

name: Movie
speaker: PRIEST
text: Lord forgive me.. they already know too, much..

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: I'm not at the hotel!

name: Movie
speaker: SECRETARY
text: Right away, Sir. I'll send you a new one to the hotel.

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Dispatch me another ZFX200 immediately. Someone stole mine.

name: Movie
speaker: SECRETARY
text: Yes, Sir!

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Who gives a shit! I didn't come here to listen to music! Listen up instead of running off at the mouth! The batteries on my phone are almost gone.

name: Movie
speaker: SECRETARY
text: Yes, Mr. Zorg, I hear you perfectly! So, how was the concert?

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: How's that? Can you hear me better now?

name: Movie
speaker: SHADOW
text: ...I can't wait to be among you.

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: The Stones will be here. I'll see to it personally!

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Fine, just fine!  I'll have the 4 pieces you asked for any time now.  But it wasn't easy. My costs have tripled.

name: Movie
speaker: SHADOW
text: How's our deal coming along?

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Got it.

name: Movie
speaker: SHADOW
text: Do you have the picture now Mr. Zorg?

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: Really? Maybe I can get you on my screen and see you at last!

name: Movie
speaker: SHADOW
text: ...Not far, now.

name: Movie
speaker: ZORG
text: No... not at all.  Where are you?

name: Movie
speaker: SHADOW
text: Am I disturbing you?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I just talked to her.

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: She died in her sleep three days ago.  It was in the paper...

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: Tom... she's dead.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: She's all I've got.  She's the only witness.

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Mrs. Christian.

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: Who are you calling?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Amy...

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: What was I supposed to think happened to you?!

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Don't...

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: You're killing me...

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I don't know what to say

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: Look where we are.  Look at yourself.  You son of a bitch, you don't have any idea what you're putting me through...

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Amy, I'm not going to let anything happen to us.

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: You should have.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I was in hell.  If I called you... if I heard your voice... it would have been so easy for me to quit. I couldn't do that.

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: No, I don't, because you're not telling me anything!

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: You don't understand...

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: You couldn't?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I wanted to call.  I couldn't.

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: You owe me an explanation.  You can't treat me like this.

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: You're sorry?  What was I supposed to think?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I don't know.  I'm sorry...

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: Why haven't you called?  Why don't you answer your phone?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: It has to be this way for now.  It won't be long.

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: Tom...

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I can't tell you, Amy.  You know I can't.  You have to trust me...

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: What's going on, Tom?  What happened?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I'm okay, honey, I'm okay.  Are you alright?

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: What happened to you?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Just do it, Amy, please, go.

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: ... What's going on?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I'm okay.  Please, honey, I can't explain.  Don't use the phone, just pack a bag and get out.  I'm on my way.  I'll be back at the house in three hours.  Call me from the hotel when you get there

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: What's wrong?  Are you alright?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Amy, just listen.  Take Cindy and get out of the house.  Do it now. Go to a hotel and stay there...

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: Tom?  Where have you been... ?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Amy, it's me.  Listen very carefully..

name: Movie
speaker: AMY
text: Hello?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES

text: It is possible... and I know this isn't something you want to hear. Your daughter may have tried to hide a note where she thought you would eventually find it, but where she knew your husband would never find it.  She might have wanted to tell you something...

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: I don't know.  I think so.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Do you think the police did a good job?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: There wasn't one.  The police looked.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: It's not really my place, but it's not easy for me to set aside the private detective part of me either. See, I know a little about missing persons.  When kids run, they almost always leave a note.  It's guilt. They want to say goodbye.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I've got what I need for my report. There is... there is one thing that bothers me though.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: You should be.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: No.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: Are you religious?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: We're all like that.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: Doesn't make much sense, does it? When everything's happy, when life's fine and you have every reason to believe there's a God, you don't bother.  Then, something horrible happens... that's when you start praying all the time.  That's when you start going to church.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: Okay.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I... I shouldn't take anymore of your time.  Maybe we can finish tomorrow.  I'll call tomorrow...

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Of course.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: People remember me from the news.  Can you drive me back now?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: No one knows what it's like.  You can't even imagine how much it hurts.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I had to ask.  I apologize.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: You try going through what we did. Bob couldn't take it, that's all. Christ, there's times when it still seems like I can't either.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I didn't mean to...

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: There wasn't anything like that. The police and the FBI people asked, but there wasn't anything happened like that, never.  My husband... his heart broke when Mary left...

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: You have to forgive me, but in these circumstances... with your daughter...  Were there any indications of... any sort of abuse?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: It got to be too much for him.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Why do you think he did it?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: We were divorced by then.  Things fell apart... he was living with a friend...

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: September 4th, 1993.  About a year after Mary disappeared.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: Yes.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: If there's anything you feel uncomfortable talking about, tell me, but I have to ask.  Your husband... he committed suicide?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: I don't know.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: What was she running from?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: She didn't seem herself.  For months there never was any way to get her to talk about it.  One night we went to bed... the next morning she was gone.  She took some clothes.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: She just seemed... depressed... ?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: No.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: So, she didn't leave a note?  She never gave any indication where she might go, before she left?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: You probably expect me to be wearing a trench coat and a hat.  Drinking whiskey, chasing women and getting beaten up by guys with broken noses. Want to know what it's really like? It's sitting in a car and staring at a hotel window for three days straight, pissing in a plastic bottle, pardon me, because some guy thinks his wife's cheating on him. Glamorous, huh?  And the guy who hired you, he has a hair-lip, dandruff and crooked teeth, and you could have told him the minute you laid eyes on him his wife's cheating, and you don't blame her.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: I didn't think there were private detectives anymore, except on TV.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: That's exactly what I am.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: They hired you.  You're like, a private detective?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: It's very important you don't let this raise your expectations.  It's not going to effect any ongoing efforts.  All I'm saying is, please know, I'm not here to create any false hope.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Well, I'm following up on your daughter, Mary, height; five four, weight; hundred ten pounds, brown eyes, blonde hair.  Born April 24, 1976.  Missing June 11th, 1992.  A runaway, that's how she's listed. Is this information correct... ?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: No.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Right, Agent Cole told me he'd call and let you know to expect me.  He didn't call?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: Neil... Neil Cole.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: What was the name... ? I've got it here somewhere...

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: These volunteer organizations are sort of interconnected, functioning hand in hand with law enforcement. The R.C.M.P. brought me in to review their investigations...  ... fact-check their records, see if there's anything they missed, anything they should be doing different.  I'm here for a few days, before I head back up to Virginia. These reports go to the Justice Department eventually.  I spoke to your F.B.I. contact a few days ago, uh...

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: Yes, but...

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I'm sorry, let me explain, the R.C.M.P. is a support organization and archive, not unlike the Center for Missing and Exploited Children in Washington.  I'm sure you've dealt with them before?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: I don't understand, who are... ?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I've been hired as an independent contractor by the U.S. Resource Center for Missing Persons as part of an internal audit.  If you have any time over the next few days, I'd like to make an appointment to ask some questions about the disappearance of your daughter.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Hello, Mrs. Mathews, my name's Thomas Jones, I'm a state licensed investigator...

name: Movie
speaker: MRS MATHEWS
text: Yes... ?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I'll do what I can.

name: Movie
speaker: NUN
text: She was the kindest, sweetest girl you'd ever want to meet.  Oh, I adored her.  I supposed I always hoped she'd be back.  After a time, all I could do was pray she had moved on to better things.  Can you get this suitcase to her parents, if you think it's appropriate?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Whatever possessed you to keep this all this time?

name: Movie
speaker: NUN
text: That's her suitcase.  I had forgotten it, till you showed me her picture.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Her belongings?

name: Movie
speaker: NUN
text: Those are her belongings.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: What is this?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: I'm trying to find out.  She was a runaway.  I'm looking into it for her parents.

name: Movie
speaker: NUN
text: Do you know what happened to her?

name: Movie
speaker: NUN
text: Yes.  I remember her.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: You... you do?  You're sure? Please, Sister, will you take another look, make sure...

name: Movie
speaker: NUN
text: Yes... I remember Mary

speaker: WELLES
text: Certainly, Senator.  If I can ever be of further assistance.

name: Movie

text: Yes, Mister Welles, thank you.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: The um... you'll find my invoice in the envelope. If that's all...

name: Movie
speaker: POLITICIAN
text: He's an imbecile.  I tried to warn my daughter, but what can you do?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: No, sir, he is not.

name: Movie
speaker: POLITICIAN
text: None too discreet, is he?

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Your son-in-law dealt with the dry cleaning franchise during the day, saw that woman every night.  The specifics are in the report, and information about the woman.  It's unpleasant, I know.  I apologize...

name: Movie
speaker: SALESPERSON
text: Certainly, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: WELLES
text: Yeah, I know the spiel.  If you could bag it, I'll be on my way, thank you.

name: Movie

text: I'm required by state law to inform you that, while it's perfectly legal for you to purchase these items, it is illegal for you to use them for any sort of...

text: Okay.  Fine.

text: No, you may not.

name: Movie

text: Cash.

name: Movie

text: Excellent.  we accept MasterCard and American Express.

text: Okay, I'll take it all.

text: No...

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Is that who you're waiting for?

name: Movie
speaker: JACOB
text: Been having bad dreams.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Hi, you don't look very well.  Are you feeling all right?

name: Movie
speaker: JACOB
text: I could tell you were sad.  I just wanted to see if you were all right.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: How did you know that?

name: Movie
speaker: JACOB
text: I'm sorry your boyfriend got killed.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: My name is...

name: Movie
speaker: JACOB
text: It's lonely in there, in my room.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Shouldn't you be in your room, Jacob?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Huh?

name: Movie
speaker: JACOB
text: Hey...wake up.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Me too.

name: Movie
speaker: DAN
text: There you go.  Love you.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: You're right.

name: Movie
speaker: DAN
text: You don't dream him up, he can't hurt you.  Or me.  Or us.  Remember...

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Yeah...I guess.

name: Movie
speaker: DAN
text: You stopped it didn't you?  It was probably just a regular bad dream.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: No.  Well, not exactly...it's that...I felt like I wasn't in control.  For the first time since...all that.  I'm scared.
