text: If this isn't a red-letter day for Tom Dickson! First I trample on the Board of Directors, then I promote Matt here to assistant cashier, and now to complete the day I have a visit from my sweet and lovely and gorgeous wife. What a man, what a man!

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. DICKSON
text: Hello, darling.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Well, look who's here! Hello, dear.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Oh, no! It's not for you. You're only going to get married. Mrs. Dickson and I are going to go on the honeymoon.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Oh!

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Say, I know what's the matter with you. Matt!

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Good morning.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Good morning, Helen.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Numbers? No, never mind.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: You want the rest of those numbers, Mr. Dickson?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Come on in here, Helen. Bring your book. I want some numbers to try to get some action. Get Parker at the Union-Leeds - the Exchange . . . Winslow and old man Harris at the Home Mortgage. Snap into it, Helen. Just as quick as you can.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Now don't you worry about it.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: In Mr. Sampson's office.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Where is he now?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Oh, Mr. Dickson - they're going to arrest Matt. They think he did it!

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Helen, tell Matt I want to see him.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: I haven't got any new stories for them this morning, either.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Longer.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Directors, eh? Long faces?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Why, the directors are waiting for you in the board room.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Ummm. Stalling, eh?  Anything new?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Why - well, I?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Guess we'll just have to sacrifice the bank. When are you and Matt going to get married?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: I don't know.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Helen, you're becoming more beautiful every day. What are we going to do about it?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Good morning.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Get Mrs. Dickson on the phone.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN'S VOICE
text: Yes?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Helen!

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: All right. Send him in.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN'S VOICE
text: Mr. Sampson . . .

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Yes?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN'S VOICE
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Helen, I'm going to Philadelphia, just as soon as the bank closes. Make all the arrangements, will you?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN'S VOICE
text: Yes?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Mr. Schaffer will take good care of you. He'll give you fifteen - maybe twenty . . .

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. PEMBROKE
text: But, Mr. Dickson, I thought you were going to take care of the mortgage. I only want ten thousand. The property is worth sixty.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Ah, Mrs. Pembroke. I spoke to Mr. Schaffer at the Guaranty. He's going to take care of that mortgage for you . . .

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. PEMBROKE
text: Mr. Dickson?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Hello, Helen.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. PEMBROKE
text: Yes, thank you.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Got my letter?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. PEMBROKE
text: Good morning, Mr. Dickson.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Good morning, Mrs. Pembroke.

name: Movie
speaker: JANITOR
text: I don't know. Mr. Sampson bought it for me.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Looks good. How much did it cost?

name: Movie
speaker: JANITOR
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Well, well, well - got your uniform, eh?

name: Movie
speaker: JANITOR
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Oh, make that uniform blue.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: You see Sampson. Tell him I sent you. You've got to have a uniform.

name: Movie
speaker: JANITOR
text: Why, I don't know.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: My goodness, you ought to have a uniform. How much does one cost?

name: Movie
speaker: JANITOR
text: No, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: You haven't got a uniform?

name: Movie
speaker: JANITOR
text: I haven't any.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Wait a minute. Where's your uniform?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Gee, thanks, Mr. Dickson?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Helen, while you're downtown, you might stop in and make reservations for the bridal suite on the Berengaria sailing next week.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: I don't want to hear any more about it. If you don't get married, I'll fire both of you.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: But I haven't . . .

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: I want you both to take the day off. Go downtown and get a license and get married right away!

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: All right. That's all.  Please, Matt.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Aw, I don't know what you're talking about. All I know is that you're losing your bank and?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: She was, wasn't she? How long has this been going on? Do you know?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Well . . . uh . . . I . . .

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Wait a minute. Answer my question. Was Mrs. Dickson there?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Listen, Mr. Dickson, don't let them lick you just because a couple of big shots turned you down. You've got more friends than anybody in this town. Little guys - guys who wouldn't be in business if it weren't for you. All you've got to do is?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Was Mrs. Dickson there?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Oh, I can explain about that later. You're losing your bank - don't you realize what that means?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Were you in Cluett's apartment?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: You're not giving up, are you, Mr. Dickson?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Why wouldn't you tell me where you were last night?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: We haven't got much time left, Mr. Dickson. We've got to do something quick or it'll be too late.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Yes, you are. You're protecting somebody. Now listen, it doesn't make any difference who it is. It can't be as important as this. Now come on, tell me. Where were you last night?  Come on, don't be a fool. Matt, you trust me, don't you?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: No, I'm not Mr. Dickson!

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: You're protecting somebody.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: No. I won't.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: I can't tell you.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Wait a minute. Wait a minute.  Matt, do you realize you're up against something? You're being charged with murder. It's serious, son. Now come on, I know you didn't do it.  But we've got to make them believe it. Come on, tell the truth, where were you last night?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: There you are.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: I already told him I was home.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: I suppose you want me to fix that up for you too, eh?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Well, I?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Aw, go on, forget it. You came through, didn't you? That's all I wanted. A lot of them didn't think you would. You don't know how much satisfaction it's been to me. It's been swell. Well, when are you and Helen going to get married?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Aw, I'm sorry, Mr. Dickson. It's just kind of sudden, that's all.  Sure, I'm excited. I think it's great. Only, well, you've done so much for me already . . . I'll never be able to thank you enough.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Say, come on. Show a little enthusiasm. What's the matter? Are you sick or something? Go on, fake it - even if it isn't real.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Sure, I think it's swell.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: What's the matter? You don't seem very excited about it.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: And what's more, keep up the good work and who knows - some day you'll be the fellow sitting behind that desk . . .  Not a bad thought, eh?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: It's all right. Thanks.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: You don't want to check up on anybody. I'll do all the checking up. Wait a minute.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Don't worry, Mr. Dickson. We'll find out whether he's telling the truth. I'll have a man from headquarters check up on it right away.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: You're lying!

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: No wonder he didn't want to mention her name.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: My wife? What's she got to do with you?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: He's just confessed. He's been mixed up with the toughest gangsters in town.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Why, you must be crazy. I've known this man for years.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: You were right, Mr. Dickson! Brown didn't have anything to do with it. Here's your man.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Listen, Matt. If you don't tell the truth, I can't help you. Where were you last night?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Of course it's true - and he knows it.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: So have you. So have I. So's everybody got a record. What difference does that make? You can't go around pinning crimes on people just because they?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Maybe. But I'm taking no chances.  Why, this kid's got a record.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: What are you talking about? He had no more to do with it than you did.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: All I know is the bank's been robbed and a murder's been committed. The way I see it, Brown here looks guilty.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Good.  You've got nothing to worry about. Soon as the report comes in, you'll be released.  And listen, don't talk so loud. Take it easy. Coast a little.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: That's what he says. I got a man from headquarters checking up on it now.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Why, certainly he can.  Matt, now all you've got to do is tell them where you were last night, between twelve and twelve-thirty, and everything will be all right.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: If he can do it, yes.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: All right. If the boy proves an alibi, he's all right, isn't he?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: The clock opposite the vault was stopped by a bullet at 12:09.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: What time did this thing happen?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Yes.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: It's an inside job. That's a cinch. Whoever did it had a pretty good picture of the layout. Now Brown, here, is in charge of the vaults, isn't he?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Why pick on him ?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: I'm afraid I must, Mr. Dickson.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: What's the matter? What's going on here?  This is ridiculous! You can't hold this boy on a vague suspicion.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: I hate to do this, but I've got to have time to dig up some help. I think I know where I can get some real cash. Snap into it, Sampson. We will lick this thing yet.

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Get all the big bills in the place. Take them out and get them changed. Get nothing but ones and fives. Distribute them among the tellers. Tell them to take their time. Stall as much as possible. Count and recount the money.

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: Mr. Dickson! Mr. Dickson!

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Don't you think I know it?

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: We can't keep open till four o'clock. We haven't cash enough to last an hour.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: I'll talk to them. Listen, go back and tell the boys to stall as much as possible. Tell 'em not to pay any attention to what I said. Tell 'em to verify every signature.

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: What'll we do?

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: The fools! If they only knew it, they're making things worse for themselves. Somebody starts a silly rumor, and they lose their heads.

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: Yes, sir. But soon as our money runs out, they'll mob the place.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Mine too?

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Did you get the case for the securities?

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: Look at them, Mr. Dickson. They're going crazy.

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: The bank's reputation wouldn't be worth a nickel after that. This is just a flurry, that's all. They've heard about the robbery and got panic-stricken. Listen, get a hold of our available securities and have them turned into cash. Wait a minute. Get my personal stuff and have that turned into cash too. Tell the boys anyone caught arguing with a depositor will be fired on the spot.

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: We haven't much on hand, you know. If it gets any worse, I hope we don't have to close the doors.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: All right. Send down to the vaults and have our reserve cash sent up here right away.

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: They've been coming in steady all morning. I have called for some extra police.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: What are you talking about?

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: The lobby's half filled now.

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: How about his nights? He's too busy running around. Tell him to keep tomorrow night open, come in and sign this thing, or I'll call this whole deal off.

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: He says he can't get away in the daytime.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: That's just exactly what he has been doing. This deal should have been closed weeks ago. Tell him to keep tomorrow open . . .

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: I'm afraid he's been stalling.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Good. I'll take this along with me. Tell Clyde I'll see him tomorrow. I'm sick and tired of the delay.

name: Movie
speaker: SAMPSON
text: Here's the data on the Clyde deal.

name: Movie
speaker: DICKSON
text: Well, Sampson, what is it?

name: Movie
speaker: GUARD
text: Please, lady. Please be quiet. Everything will be all right.  Open up here, folks. All right, folks, please!

name: Movie
speaker: LADY
text: But you said it would be safe! It's his life insurance money. Oh, please, I'll go to the Old Ladies' Home if you don't do something, please!

name: Movie
speaker: GUARD
text: Quiet down, please! Take it easy, folks. Everything will be all right.

name: Movie
speaker: LADY
text: It's his life insurance money, you know.

name: Movie
speaker: GUARD
text: Absolutely.

name: Movie
speaker: LADY
text: Is it safe?

name: Movie
speaker: GUARD
text: Yes, ma'am, you can deposit your money here.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: All right.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. DICKSON
text: Oh, well. I guess the only other thing for me to do is to go out and buy myself a few sticks of dynamite. When he comes out, you tell him I'll be back. He hasn't gotten rid of me!

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Hardly.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. DICKSON
text: Well, take my word for it, and don't try it. It's useless!  If it were some other woman, I could handle her, but after all, you can't scratch a bank's eyes out now, can you?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: No.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. DICKSON
text: Helen, did you ever try competing with a bank?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: I'm afraid so.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. DICKSON
text: Board meeting. Oh, that means hours, I suppose.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: He's at a board meeting.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. DICKSON
text: Is that busy husband of mine busy?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: How-do-you-do, Mrs. Dickson.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Matt, look! There's Mr. Jones!

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: The big guys have got the screws on him. You've got to come through for him, Mr. Conway. He came through for you a hundred times. If his friends don't help him, who is going to help him?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Mr. Williams . . .

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Dickson's in a jam I tell you. The run's getting worse.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Yeah.  I got an idea. Come on, let's get to a telephone.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Did you talk to him?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Sure, they'd turn him down. He ought to know that. I'm going in there and talk to him.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Yes. He called some of the biggest people in town.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: They must have turned him down.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Something's happened. He isn't trying anymore.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: What's he doing, honey? Is he getting any help?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Don't cry, honey. Everything's gonna be all right.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Oh, Matt . . .

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: All right, dear.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Shh . . . !  I'll wait for you upstairs.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Okay, honey - but just the same I'd like to take a crack at that?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Now you've got me worried, dear.  Promise me you won't butt in.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Can you imagine that guy? He was kissing her.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Oh now, don't be silly.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Who? Cluett? No, not yet. But I'd like to take a crack at that stiff- necked, horse dollar.[6]

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Say Matt, you haven't done anything about what you saw today, have you?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Oh, Charlie again.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: What's keeping you?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Yes, right in his office, the rat. I'd like to take a crack at that guy.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: In Cluett's office?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: I tell you, I saw them!

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Oh Matt, you must be mistaken.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Well, he was making love to her.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Well . . . ?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Come here.  You know, a few minutes ago I was in Cluett's office and Mrs. Dickson was there.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: What's the matter, Matt? Gee, I thought you'd be thrilled to death.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Yeah.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: What happened? What did he say? Did you get the job?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Yeah, swell.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Say, I just heard the merger isn't going thru. Isn't that grand?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Oh, Matt.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: All right, I'm lying. Don't forget you called me a liar.

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Yes.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Oh, you think I'm lying?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: No.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: A friend of mine - yeah, really - his mother was terribly sick and she was dying, would you believe it?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Yes.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Oh, ten dollars?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: The ten dollars.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: With what?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: What did you do with it?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Oh, is that so?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Hey, look out, somebody's likely to see us!

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Come here, honey!

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Why?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Matt, come here!

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Hello, Helen!

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Are you sure?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: He came to see Mr. Cluett.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: He was here?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: He was in the bank yesterday.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Yes, why?

name: Movie
speaker: HELEN
text: Did you say Dude Finlay?

name: Movie
speaker: MIKE
text: Yes, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Dude Finlay?

name: Movie
speaker: MIKE
text: He left here about an hour ago and went down to Dude Finlay's joint.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Never mind all that. What did you find out?

name: Movie
speaker: MIKE
text: I've been trailing the cashier like you told me. You're right about that guy, chief. There's something screwy somewhere.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: What did you find out, Mike?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: That's all, Mrs. Halligan. Thanks.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. HALLIGAN
text: Listen here, young man - nobody ever called me a liar yet and got away with it?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: There you are!

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. HALLIGAN
text: No - because me clock struck four, and when it strikes four, it's one.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Yes, I know. Cause the Dooley sisters weren't in yet.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. HALLIGAN
text: No. It wasn't earlier because...

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: It couldn't have been earlier?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. HALLIGAN
text: Yes, I guess it was one, 'cause...

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Was it twelve o'clock?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. HALLIGAN
text: That's just what I'm trying to tell you, sir. It was a half hour after the Dooley sisters . . .

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: I don't care about the Dooley sisters - what time did he get in?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. HALLIGAN
text: Now, let me see - a half hour after the Dooley sisters - and the Dooley sisters never get home until after?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: What time did Matt Brown get in?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. HALLIGAN
text: Huh?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: What time was it?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. HALLIGAN
text: It was late, I know. The Dooley sisters was already in. They work at a show, you know.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: What time was it, Mrs. Halligan?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. HALLIGAN
text: ?for the rheumatism, you know.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. HALLIGAN
text: Sure I do. He has the best room in me house. The one with the fancy wallpaper.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Do you know this young man, Mrs. Halligan?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Then where were you?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: But I wasn't here, Mr. Dickson. Honest I wasn't . . .

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Yes.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Eleven o'clock, eh? Are you sure it was that?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Well, about - uh - eleven o'clock.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: What time did you get in?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Yes.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: So you were home last night?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: I don't know.

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Then who changed it?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: You used to carry a gun, didn't you?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: I didn't do it! I haven't got a gun!

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: Sit down! When the watchman surprised you, you shot him - what'd you do with the gun?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: wasn't anywhere near this place?

name: Movie
speaker: INSPECTOR
text: You turned off the burglar alarm, you set the time clock, came back at twelve and emptied the boxes, didn't you?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: They're starting to come in already. Yeah. Yeah. Well, listen. Don't waste any time. Get all the money you can lay your hands on, and bring it down here right away. Step on it.

name: Movie
speaker: TELLER
text: Certainly, Mr. Jones! Certainly! Charlie!

name: Movie
speaker: TELLER
text: Charlie's upstairs as sore as a pup. He's out fourteen cents, and he can't find it.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Where's Charlie?

name: Movie
speaker: TELLER
text: I guess so.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Everybody in?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: Bought himself a pocketbook!

name: Movie
speaker: TELLER
text: Yeah, what did he do with his first one?

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: That mug reminds me of a guy with his second dollar.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: You've got enough?

name: Movie
speaker: TELLER
text: I'm okay, Matt.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: How are you fixed?

name: Movie
speaker: TELLER
text: Okay, Matt.

name: Movie
speaker: MATT
text: You're carrying too much money on you, Hank. You better turn some in tonight.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Now you tell us.

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: Sometimes a wound will kill.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: This is healing?

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Jim Younger, I told you--

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: I couldn't lose him.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Tom, I'm this close to coming with you...

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: I think I may just go on to the reservation.

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: I said like a Comanche, not this Comanche.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: You can ride like that?

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: It's tougher than it looks.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: He's not bad at it.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Things changed when you quit the gang. For example, I'm now the one who says "Let's ride."

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: You're just upset about Jesse. We all are.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: I'm sorry, Cole.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Swear on Jimmy's grave.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: I swear --

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Swear.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Bob. I didn't...

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?!

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: I ain't done --

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: What have you done?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: How'd they --

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Leave me alone, Bob.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Cole, we're outlaws. Not exactly the most respectable job, if you know what I mean.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: As long as people think Jesse's still riding, we will never get the respect we deserve.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: That was because of... the reputation the gang had.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: It's still taking too long. The people used to snap to.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: This is the best score yet.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: That's what the newspapers say. Weren't for Jesse James, this gang wouldn't be able to find a goat's ass with a stick.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Frankly, yes. I'm feeling a little left out.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: We got a problem here, brother?

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Say we bust into a bank. We yell "We're the Younger-James Gang!" People are gonna be thinking, "The younger James Gang? Is there an older James Gang? How come we never heard of the older James gang?" So people are trying to figure that out instead of raising their arms.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: How?

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: No, Jimmy has a point. The Younger-James Gang could be confusing.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: You stay out of this, Bob.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Uhh, yeah it does.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Better pass them over here before something happens to 'em.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: These are deeds and mortgages of farms the bank was holding for the railroad.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: I say we ride into town and kill us some Pinkertons and railroad men.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: The sheriff says it was a gang of drunk Kansas boys.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Our place, Clell Miller's, Sammy Johnston, the Creeders. Will Hite.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Zee, I'm pleased you came.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Here's Liberty's favorite son!  I'll never forget what you did, cousin.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: That was two hours ago.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Your Ma wouldn't let us leave until we ate something.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Anywhere nobody's shooting at me is pretty.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Never thought that pissant town would look so pretty.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Never a good thing.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: He's smiling.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Dammit, this stopped being fun about two years ago!

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Gatling! They've got a Gatling!

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Tomorrow.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: The Army can hang him.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: They said because the detectives were working for the Department of the Interior --

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Damn!

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: He just lost his temper a little.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Oh no...

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: They came up, made the same offer they made you folks. Our little brother Jim tried to chase 'em off, one of those detectives hit him in the head, knocked him out. Cole lost his temper.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Stop by our spread after that, tell our Ma we're all right. We'll go to Doc Mimms.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Cole, I want to get to the farm, make sure Little Jim and the girls are okay.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: ... Will Perry ...

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Jesus mercy, that's Charlie Higgins, Dave Laller ...

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Then I love it.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Nope.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Corn gonna shoot at me?

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Well, somebody better go tell THE DAMN YANKEES!

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Yesterday.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I can hit those boys from here. We just need a distraction.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: My plan of lying here pissing myself seems to be working mighty fine, thank you.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Tell me.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Listen, he's my brother and I don't want to start trouble...

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: He's planning a job.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: He's been full of vinegar lately.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Listen, Jesse, we've got a problem.  It's Cole.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: You are a fine figure of a man.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: The things a fella has to do to get a little respect around here...

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Yes. I am obviously not standing out in people's minds at the robberies.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: This is about the "Wanted!" Posters, isn't it.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: You heard me, Jesse. You know how crazy I get!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Beg pardon?

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: One false move and I'll blow your heads off!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Okay, folks, I think we know how this is going to go...

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: "Bank officials estimate the loss at fifty thousand dollars."

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Hey!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: "The outlaws calling themselves the James-Younger Gang shot their way out of town, wounding the Sherriff and three other townsfolk."

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: We oughta take some of this, give it to our neighbors in Liberty. Lot of people hurting up there.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Well, no, Jesse, it was the bank's. That's why we had to go to all that trouble of stealing it.  You explain it to him.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: All right, settle down. All this money ain't ours.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Exactly.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: But if we take their money and supplies...

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Not yet. But I'm hoping.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: You have no shame.

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Two.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: How many of them did he kill?

name: Movie
speaker: BOB
text: Best damn plan I heard all war.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Home. We go home. We ride like hell to get there, and we kill anything or anyone that comes between us and our homes. And when we get there we stay there and God help any fool who tries to get me to leave my farm again.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: No, really. You're wife said she needed some help, seeing as you were so fat you couldn't find your --

name: Movie
speaker: BURLY DETECTIVE
text: You shut up now, boy.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I think I saw you leavin' by the front door just as I was coming in the back.

name: Movie
speaker: BURLY DETECTIVE
text: How?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I think I recognize you.

name: Movie
speaker: BURLY DETECTIVE
text: What you sayin' boy?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: You, ya barrel of pork lard. Here piggy piggy!

name: Movie
speaker: BURLY DETECTIVE
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: We didn't. Zerelda did. Turns out your wife makes a hell of an outlaw.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Where'd you get all these riders?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Pff. All we been through, the thought never crossed my mind.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: You know, you gettin' caught, right after leaving us, some people thought --

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Missed you too, cousin.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Missed you, cousin.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Who's next? You? Me? Bob?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: WHAT?! We follow you for a year, and now that our blood's been spilled, you're gonna quit?!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I'm out.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: We'll make them pay for this.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Pass me some whisky.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Bob, rip up some bandages.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Clell, Tom, go get Doc Mimms in Liberty!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Okay, you're gonna rest here.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: A trap.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Dammit!

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: You'll be smiling once you've got all that money to spend, cousin.  Cole Younger's going to make everybody rich!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Fine. We hit this bank.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Then let me run the show, General Lee.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Still smells fishy.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: And I'm the better outlaw.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: I'm the better soldier, Jesse.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: That's it.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: And almost got hanged in peacetime.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: I got us through the War all right.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: A bad idea.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Now the one time one of us comes up with an idea --

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Beautiful.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: You're forgetting who's in charge --

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: I've robbed just as many banks as you have! I know this town, and I know this bank, and I say it's an easy job.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What are you saying?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: If you'd read about it first, you'd have no problems.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Smells funny, it being mentioned in the paper.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What will be?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: It'll be the biggest score yet.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Hold on, hold on, we all know Bob is an important part of the gang.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: This is your fault for hogging all the publicity.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Why aren't we the "Younger-James Gang"? I mean, there's three Younger brothers and only two James brothers here.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Yep.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: All the posters and newspapers are calling this bunch the "James-Younger Gang."

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Sure, cousin.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Jesse, we got to have a word.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Twenty?!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: "The Fidelity Bank and Trust was robbed on Tuesday by a gang of twenty heavily armed men."

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: It's better. It's a construction depot. They'll have the strongbox and some ammo and explosives for us to take. That way we can take on a bigger job.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: It's not a bank.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Just because he reads all those books and knows all those big words doesn't make him smart.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: See, Frank's being smart about this.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: I got three.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I got seven thousand.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Don't let it happen again.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Sorry.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: The James-Younger Gang.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Let's ride.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Perfect, Cole.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: I'll pick the first job! I mean... I know a girl down at the bank. See if she can't get a list of towns where the railroad keeps its money.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Just like in the war. Harass their supply lines. We kill the railroad's men, they won't care.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: So what do we do, General Lee?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: This isn't a feud, this is war. They've got more men than we do. We kill detectives, they can replace 'em in a day.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Yeah.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Because we were good at it?  Hell, we were great at it. Jesse, don't tell anyone I said this, because everybody knows I'm the toughest man in this town, but you are one terrifying sonofabitch with those guns.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: But it was a whole lot of killing. Why should we miss that?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: It was exciting.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: The war? What, are you crazy?  There are things I miss about it.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: After all you did on our farm?  You miss it, don't you Jesse?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Thanks for the help.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: All right, calm down. I'll agree Sadie was a woman --

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: She was European!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: She had a moustache.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: She got two of them.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: You ever notice Zerelda's eyes?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: In case we have to kill these sonofabitches, I don't want them to see us coming.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: What is wrong with you?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Not now.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Pick your fights, cousin. You taught me that.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: You're not scared, are you?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Hands off your hip, Cole.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Planting corn. Harvesting corn. Year after year.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Home, boys. Back to our farms.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: There's Yankees back there. Lot's of 'em.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Where you boys going?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Suit yourself. We'll have some horses waiting for you at the road.  Let's ride, Rangers!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I could use the walk.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Ride with me, cousin?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What's going on?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: 'Bout time you got here, buddy.

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: I'm thinking...

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Well?

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: Hmm. Go back to the reservation and get drunk in a dirt shack, or work for you...

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Tom, why don't you stop at our spread before you head on out to the reservation? Figure we might have some work for you, if you want.

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: You ride like a Comanche.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Wait'll we get back to Missouri, start telling those gals about how little Jesse James charged the whole Union Army by himself!

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: You pay me to find you Bluecoats. There they are.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Some Indian tracker you turned out to be, Tom.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: They're just insurance in case we run.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: They gonna rush us?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Another dozen out back.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Cole, he didn't mean that.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Oh, you're in charge? We ain't partners any more, Jesse? You tell Cole Younger where and when to ride?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Jesse.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: -- Exactly. Because this is a war.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Strategically.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Hey! We decide something, that's it! We're in this for the long haul, and this idea of me and Jesse's will help give us more places to hide out without worrying about some farmer with a shotgun sneakin' up on us in our sleep. We've got to think --

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Get buckets!

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: BASTARDS! Come back here and face me!

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Ah.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Shakespeare.  He's European.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: I have no idea what you just said, but it sounded real nice.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Sadie was not a man!

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Oh, Lord, the dance hall girl at Bunty's...

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: The brown one.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Which one, right or left?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I think one of 'em's glass.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Must be a garrison in town. We're in occupied territory, boys.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: What the --

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Soon as I hit one, the other'll know and beat us up.

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: Both would be nice.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Cannon or Gatling?

name: Movie
speaker: TELLER
text: All right, all right.  Jesse James never yelled at folk...

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: OPEN THE DAMN SAFE!

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: This here is the Younger Gang!

name: Movie
speaker: TELLER
text: Where is Jesse James?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: TELLER
text: Of course!  Uh, sir?

name: Movie
speaker: COLE
text: The safe. Now.

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: Me get heap firewater --

name: Movie
speaker: MARSHALL
text: Go ahead to the saloon. But don't get too drunk!

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: Ho-yah!

name: Movie
speaker: MARSHALL
text: East? East above the river heading for the Eagle Pass?

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: Ho-yah. Him say tell Big Lawman in Carville that badman Jesse James riding toward Rising Sun, above Great River, near Eagle Rock.

name: Movie
speaker: MARSHALL
text: Of St. Louis?

name: Movie
speaker: MARSHALL
text: The District Marshall

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: Great Chief of St. Louis send me.

name: Movie
speaker: MARSHALL
text: Yeah, Injun. What do you want?

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: You 'um big lawman?

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: I'd appreciate that.

name: Movie
speaker: OLD MAN
text: Fine. I'll just wait here.

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: It's a secret.

name: Movie
speaker: OLD MAN
text: Oh. Why didn't you just say so?

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: On account of we're robbing it.

name: Movie
speaker: OLD MAN
text: Then why can't I go in there?

name: Movie
speaker: COMANCHE TOM
text: You're right, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: OLD MAN
text: I know it ain't no durned bank holiday!

name: Movie
speaker: SHERRIFF
text: Shit.

name: Movie
speaker: DEPUTY
text: I had you covered.  From back there.

name: Movie
speaker: SHERRIFF
text: Where the hell were you?

name: Movie
speaker: SHERRIFF
text: When have you ever known Old Man Tucker not to be yelling at everybody?

name: Movie
speaker: DEPUTY
text: So?

name: Movie
speaker: SHERRIFF
text: Old Man Tucker is just standing quiet outside the bank.

name: Movie
speaker: DEPUTY
text: What is it?

name: Movie
speaker: SHERRIFF
text: What the --

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: It's fine by me, Jesse.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Yesss, but I was thinking, I could come by, and then take Zee out. Some place near. With other folk. Near. Here.  But out.

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: You know you're welcome any time!

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: Go on. You're pretty much all healed up.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What do you say, sir?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Go home, Doc.  They ain't gonna hang no more Liberty boys.

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: Boys...

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Died a hero.

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: Web died fighting?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Pff. He jumped his horse clear over our heads, killed a dozen Union soldiers before they knew what hit them.

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: My little Web did that?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: -- rode right into them, screaming like a banshee.

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: I'm upset too, Zee, but Jesse and Cole know what they're doing. I'm sure they won't press their luck.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: He thinks this is some kind of game!

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: I think he's already feeling better.

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: Well, I hope the boy pulls through. We should know in the morning.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: I fooled them into thinking I was alone.

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: They're gone. What are you --

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: The bullet came out clean, but he lost a whole lot of blood. Praying wouldn't hurt.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: He's going to be fine, right Daddy?

name: Movie
speaker: DOC MIMMS
text: Zerelda, it's no coincidence. The railroad men come through, offering to buy up land. Nobody sells. Then they start hanging men who own farms for treason?

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Daddy, don't start with this again.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Hell, they hardly even noticed us.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: See you soon. Oh, and I appreciate the distraction back there.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I'll meet you down there in a few weeks.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I'm sure it seemed like a good idea at the time.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: A war against the railroad. What the hell were we thinking?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Yeah.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: You're a piss-poor liar for the smartest man I know.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Railroad burned him out too. You couldn't have stopped him.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: He was a boy riding with the most famous outlaws in the West. How was he supposed to say no to that?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Jim was old enough...

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Shoulda learned with Web. Made it look fun, made it look like an adventure. Got Web killed. Now Jim.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Got any ideas, little brother?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: They're all pinned down. Can't even get to the door.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: No, I --

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: You taking sides against me, now, Frank?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Just do me a favor. Think about what this is costing everybody. Not just the railroad.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Oh yeah.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: We're drunk.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: A better life than the one you could have had with Zee?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What do you want me to say, Frank? I was killing men when I was fifteen. I like getting shot at. I like riding out of town with a posse at my back. This is a helluva better life than farming.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Maybe it started out that way. But now...

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: We're doing this for Ma.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I can't quit and leave you alone. I can't quit until you quit. Ma would've wanted it that way.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: That's a lie. You could've bought a dozen farms with the money we've stolen.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: If I could go back to farming --

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: You've killed your fair share of men.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: It got to you, didn't it. All the killing in the war. You need it now.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: And we're good at it.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Jesse, we're outlaws.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: This has been a good year.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Bob here'll kill a man for sneezing, and he's the best shot in the gang.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Pardon the delay, folks, but we had to get Mad Bob Younger under control!

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: The posters?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Bob's upset.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Gents, we are in the middle of something here.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: It's the scientific method. It's all the rage.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I don't think it's counterfeit. Do you mind if I take a look at all your real bills to compare?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: And I do so want to shoot some Pinkerton detectives.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: And it's guarded by Pinkerton detectives.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: And that's why you both lead the gang. Two of you went into that bank together, right?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: And I planned getting you off the hangman's deck --

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: We're gonna have to talk...

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Fine. How'd it go out here?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: How'd it go in there?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Make a thousand of 'em. Still won't be enough by the time I'm through.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Didn't think you would.  I'm going to go make the coffin.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Don't care.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: ... We could move on. Rebuild. Make a decent life someplace else.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Ma.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Pinkertons. It's the railroad.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Shut up.  Uh, Doc, I was wondering if, uh, this evening, I could come by?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: You're looking a bit more spry now that somebody --

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Would you get in the carriage? Until Ma has you home so she can fuss over you herself, she's gonna make me miserable.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What do you think?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: You ready to stop loafing around with this young lady and get back to farming?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Damn. All that reading paid off.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I went up to the courthouse and looked at the right of way documents for the rail bed. The railroad doesn't even need our land, they're just taking the land on both sides for as far as they can.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Heard of him.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: You know him?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Your Zee? Hmm.  "From women's eyes this doctrine I derive: they sparkle still the right Promethean fire; They are the books, the arts, the academes, that show, contain, and nourish all the world."

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: -- if you stop saying things about my Zee.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What worries me is that Jesus is talking back.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: She's still talking to Jesus.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Next time try "fat and haggard."

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I swear I'll shoot you in your sleep.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: You are a charmer.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: You can shut up now.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: "Big and older"?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Maybe, maybe...

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: That just might work.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What kind of story are they going to believe?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Think about this. If we just come up with a story and stick to it, we should be all right.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: All we thought about was coming home. I swore I'd kill anybody who tried to get me off my farm again. If I have to go to war with the railroad to stay, fine by me.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Saved all our lives, Doc. None of the Liberty boys would have come home if not for Web Mimms, Doc. God's honest truth.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Whyyyy... he took down the Gatling gun and the cannon all by himself.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Zee, we got to talk to you and your father.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: You're doing just fine.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Frank, don't you have something to say?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: We better go to Doc's, see what's going on here.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Looks like Web Mimms wasn't the only casualty this town's got.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: All this time in the saddle... We get to the farm, I'm going to shoot this damn horse just on principle.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Hello, Liberty Missoura!

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I'm sure it seemed like a good idea at the time.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Hell of a war.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I reckoned.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Web's dead.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: No, Jesse, your problem is you're always doing stuff before I'm finished figuring it out.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: See, that's your problem, Frank. By the time you finish figuring out stuff, I'm already finished doing it.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I figure.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: That would have made an impression.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: You could have worn one of those big, floppy woman's Easter Sunday hats.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Such as?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Mm-hmm.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: So you're saying I could have done more to attract their attention.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Pff. They hardly even noticed you.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Distracting enough for you?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: So we got a plan?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Every time I put my head up to hit that Gatling, they try to shoot it off.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Everything but the boring parts.

name: Movie
speaker: JIMMY
text: How much of that story is true?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Yeah Jimmy?

name: Movie
speaker: JIMMY
text: Uncle Frank?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I think... he was just a real interestin' fella to have around.

name: Movie
speaker: JIMMY
text: So what was he?

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Can't argue that.

name: Movie
speaker: JIMMY
text: But he killed a lot of men, too.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Saved a lot of folk from the railroad.

name: Movie
speaker: JIMMY
text: They're making him a hero now.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: That he was.

name: Movie
speaker: JIMMY
text: Sounds like he was a hell of a man.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Allow a man his version of the past. When you get to be my age, you've got enough painful memories, you're allowed to soften a few of the edges up.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: I know. But that's how it should have ended. Your Dad and Mom, riding off into a new life, growing old together, happy.

name: Movie
speaker: JIMMY
text: ...every time you tell that story, you stop there. That's not how it ended. I was five when my dad got shot.

name: Movie
speaker: FRANK
text: Yeah, Jimmy?

name: Movie
speaker: JIMMY
text: Y'know, Uncle Frank...

name: Movie
speaker: MA
text: Shush.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Doc Mimms will --

name: Movie
speaker: MA
text: Take care of each other, boys. You say your prayers.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: We know, Ma. Now we got to get you to Doc Mimms.

name: Movie
speaker: MA
text: Riders --

name: Movie
speaker: MA
text: Boys?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Ma! Please!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Somebody's in a vengeful smiting mood today.

name: Movie
speaker: MA
text: The Lord says we can bury 'em out back in the orchard, nobody'll ever find them.

name: Movie
speaker: MA
text: We're just fine, thank you, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Easterners.

name: Movie
speaker: MA
text: He's a good Christian and he killed Yankees. Jesus told me that made him an all right boy.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Ma, I'm glad to see you being nice to our Injun friend.

name: Movie
speaker: MA
text: Say your prayers?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: A fair number, Ma.

name: Movie
speaker: MA
text: Did you kill Yankees?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I'll explain on the way.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Tennessee?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Yes ma'am.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Don't swear.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: You are a hell of a woman.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: I can't believe I had to blow up a train for you.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Yes ma'am.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: You get arrested again, I'll kill you.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: If you don't see it, it's not real...

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Don't turn around.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Swimming. Swimming is good.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Stop it. This is just sad.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Aw, shucks, ma'am...

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Jesse, have you ever noticed that when you're trying to charm your way out of trouble, your accent gets all farm boy?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Now, sweetie, y'all wouldn't go believing one of them silly dime novels, would you?

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Oh, I'm not finished.  "When he sauntered into a saloon, his spurs jangling and his pockets full of gold, the ladies flocked around him like flies to a candied apple."  As I said. Hmm.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Let me see that.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: "Blazing Guns of the West. True Stories of Jesse James." Only a dime in the hotel lobby.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I beg your pardon?

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: "But the life of the James Gang wasn't all robbing and shooting and killing, for these young Missouri bucks had a taste for the ladies... especially the handsome and charismatic Jesse James."

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: "Hmm" what?

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Hmm.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Now wait a minute. There are certain things that have to wait until after the wedding.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I've got you. You keep me busy. I figure we'll get over to the hotel... get checked in, cleaned up... then I'd like to do something I've been thinking about for a long time.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Are you going to be happy here, Mr. James? Without all that excitement?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: That's why I picked it. We can start a whole new life down here.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: I would never have imagined us in a place like this.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: She's beautiful. Smart. And has the biggest... buck teeth in all of Missouri.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: That's... wonderful. It's just... I thought...

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: She's the most wonderful woman in the world. Can't get her out of my mind.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: I don't understand.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I had to see you. I'm getting married.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Jesse. What are you thinking? There are bounty hunters and lawmen all over this county!

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Zee.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: When my name makes them cry in their sleep. When I've brought them to ashes.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Whose justice? Yours or God's?  When will you stop?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Laws don't touch men like Thaddeus Rains. Only justice does.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Let the law --

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Me neither.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: You and I, we've started... something, you know?  I don't know what'll happen if you do this.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Frank and me have to go away for a while.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: I am so sorry, Jesse.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I've been planning on kissin' you for a very long time.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Were you planning on kissing me when you finished quoting?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Yep.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Is this one of Frank's Shakespeare poems you're trying to quote?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Little ones.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Sparkling rocks?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Ahem. "From this doctrine..." No, ah... "From women's eyes this doctrine I derive, they sparkle still like ... shiny... sparkling rocks..."

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Honestly, you'd do if only you had the buck teeth.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Where will you find such a girl?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Smart. Funny. Bossy. Always makes me think she's two steps ahead of me. And big buck teeth.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: And what's this right girl like?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Not if I find the right girl.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: You planning on being a bachelor your whole life, Jesse James?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Mostly. It would be an all right life, for a bachelor.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Thank God you grew out of that.  You did grow out of that, didn't you?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Arr. Hand over your jewels, Missy.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: A river pirate.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I was thinking more along the lines of being a river pirate.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: You didn't want to farm?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I used to come to this tree when I was a kid and imagine what my life would be like when I got older.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Unfair. You are completely unfair.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: So you're saying I should leave you alone and go spend time with Jimmy Younger?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I wasn't the only one risking my neck that day.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Everybody in the county knows it was you who rescued Cole. We're all so proud of you, Jesse. And not a single farm's been sold to the railroad since. You're everybody's hero.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: I shouldn't tease a hero.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: What you do to me is unfair. The teasing, I mean.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Teasing you is completely unfair.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: No! I mean, of course not. No.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: You're sick of my company?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: I've been on my back two weeks. I'm sick of it.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: You shouldn't be up.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Nuh-huh ...

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Jesse, is that your hand?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Mmmm.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: Jesse, are you awake?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: If there's anything we can do for you, Dr. Mimms. We want to help.

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: But still died.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: But you got big!

name: Movie
speaker: ZEE
text: You were little Jesse James when you left.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Zerelda? Little Zee Mimms?

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Fair enough.

name: Movie
speaker: PINKERTON
text: I'd just as soon kill you, Jesse James. But chasing you takes up too much of my time.

name: Movie
speaker: JESSE
text: Thanks.

name: Movie
speaker: PINKERTON
