speaker: HOMELESS MAN
text: I'm so hungry.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: It's cold out, too, isn't it?

name: Movie
speaker: HOMELESS MAN
text: I'm so hungry.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Yes, it is.

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: Is that a raincoat?

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: No, Owen.

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: Why are there copies of the Style section all over the place? Do you have a dog? A chow or something?

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Yes, Owen?

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: Hey, Halberstam?

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: They're okay. BATEMAN Their early work was a little too New Wave for my taste. But then Sports came out in 1983, I think they really came into their own, commercially and artistically.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: You like Huey Lewis and the News?

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Come on, you dumb son of a bitch.  I've got a preview of the Barneys catalogue and a bottle of Absolut waiting for us.

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: No, man. I'm gonna bail.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Two-hundred-and-fifty. Very reasonable. Let's leave a big tip, shall we? My place hr a nightcap?

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Paul, give me your Amex card. Good boy. Bateman slaps the card down, looks at the check.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Another Martini, Paul?

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: Evelyn. Great ass. Goes out with that loser Patrick Bateman. What a dork.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Cecelia is, well...you know

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: And Cecelia, how is she? Where is she tonight?

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: I could tell you that, Halberstam, but then I'd have to kill you.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: So, wasn't Rothschild originally handling the Fisher account? How did you get it?

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Nobody goes there anymore.

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: We should've gone to Dorsia. I could've gotten us a table.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Hey, I'm a child of divorce. Give me a break  Hmmm, I see they've omitted the pork loin with lime jello.

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: Yeah, well, you're late.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Listen, the mud soup and the charcoal arugula are outrageous here.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Oh yes. I'm very lucky.

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: And how's Cecilia? She's a great girl.

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: Oh well, you know.

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: Really? That's interesting.  Not great?

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: It's...it's...all right.

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: How's the Ransom account going, Marcus?

name: Movie
speaker: BATEMAN
text: I've been great. And you?

name: Movie
speaker: OWEN
text: Hello, Halberstam. Nice tie. How the hell are you?

name: Movie
speaker: VAN PATTEN
text: Some guys are just born cool, I guess.

name: Movie
speaker: PRICE
text: I just don't see how someone, anyone, can appear that way and yet be involved in such total shit. How can you be so fucking, I don't know, cool about it?

name: Movie
speaker: PRICE
text: I don't believe it. He looks so...normal. He seems so... out of it. So...undangerous.

name: Movie
speaker: VAN PATTEN
text: What shit? Now where do we have reservations at? I mean I'm not really hungry, but I would like to have reservations somewhere.

name: Movie
speaker: PRICE
text: How can he lie like that? How can he pull that shit?

name: Movie
speaker: VAN PATTEN
text: Good point. Excuse me, gentlemen.

name: Movie
speaker: PRICE
text: You'll look like you consciously worked for the look.

name: Movie
speaker: VAN PATTEN
text: You think so?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Anything? That's not even credible. If he wants to go up there? To check it out? I think you should encourage him.  It's his life. But everybody's treating him like this -- valuable object. You're hurting your own case.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: I can't help it. I feel like they'd do anything to keep their --

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: I can paint anywhere.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: You don't wanna move, do you?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: You know what he's like. He just wants to work on stuff that's cool.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: I'm just screwed.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: You know what I mean.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: "Make" him?

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: Alice? You gotta make him do the start-up with Teddy and me.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: 'Gonna wait outside.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: You are a fanatic.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: They still have to give 'em refreshments laced with mind-altering drugs.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Is it over?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: You're just afraid to eat it.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Right. Wait. A toast.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: It's gonna get cold.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: ...wanna savor this.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Great.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Here we go.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Oh, right. Hold on.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Don't we have any chopsticks?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Milo?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: I know you. You're gonna run back to work right after dinner. I want my kiss now.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: ...What?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Yeah? Give me a goodbye kiss.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You look beautiful.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Look at me! I'm gonna change.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Great!

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Just shut up?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: No. No. I sent an E-mail to somebody, just now. To tell her how I feel about you.  You know I'm clueless, without you. You know I --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I went to see the Skywire model in Gary's office. You know. Just to hold it again.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Are you gonna tell me where you went?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Milo, you --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I know you think I'm too attached to him, but still. I am close to Gary. And you're the most meaningful person in my life.  I'm going back to the Comix place, why should I be killing myself.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Milo --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It's for the Museum. He knows you're a painter. If anybody should be invited --

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: He has thousands of employees, Milo --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Why doesn't he ask us to his party. He's never even met you.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Look at this.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Okay, yeah. I did something naughty... There's this amazing Comix store in Seattle.  To tell you the truth, I did it once or twice at Stanford. 'Guess I can't keep anything from you...

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Where were you?  You know you can't keep anything from me.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: ...Different?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: That was -- different.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Poor baby. You know that's not true.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: If I'd stayed down there, maybe this wouldn't've happened.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Guilt?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: After I broke into 21 -- which was insane, thank God they didn't catch me! -- I just drove around. Trying to figure out what possessed me. You know what? I've been putting my own guilt on Gary.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: I remember.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: The Justice Department guy who came to the apartment when --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Remember Lyle Barton?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: ...Why?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It's what they said it is. An unfinished broadcast studio. You were right... I just drove to Seattle and back.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Nothing?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Nothing.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: It's almost nine, I've been so worried!  What did you see in there?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: So you believe me?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: ...Whaddo I do?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I know how to get in there. But you've gotta help me.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Is it two? Or is it three? Have you ever really noticed?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: They stop the construction work at six or seven. The parking lot's mostly clear by two or three in the morning. Even the early Geeks don't get there before five.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: You can't just walk in, either.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I can't just walk away!

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Milo, you told me those DOJ Agents are all over the place. How could they hope to hide a surveillance post?  And how can you get in there, anyway? With the cameras and the swipe cards --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It's the only one with dishes on the roof. The studio's a front. That's why they keep postponing its opening.  ...gotta get in there.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Even if all this were true. There're 20 other buildings. All of them filled with computers and --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: How should I know? "Solving a problem," I guess. Or needing to control everything. I don't know.  I've gotta get in there.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Milo. Why would he --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You think I don't know that?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: "Like this?" It's Gary you're talking about.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Go where? You can't get away from people like this.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: You're scaring me. I think we should just go.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It isn't a broadcast studio. It's -- a surveillance post or something. That's why they have the dishes on top.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Nobody does work like this on-line. It's in your PC, or in a mainframe. Self-contained. They'd have to be, like, watching people. Physically.  Oh Jesus.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: They hack into people's programs?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I don't know! I just know it was Teddy's code. All these ideas flying in from everywhere. You know how he says "Any kid working in his garage can put us out of business?" It's like they know what every kid's doing.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: I can't see Outpost putting its reputation in the hands of people like that.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I don't know what I'm saying. Maybe -- maybe they hired those guys.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Are you saying you think they had something to do with his death? Nelson said it was an airtight case.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: It was a hate crime.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: What're you -- what?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Teddy was killed last night.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: What!

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You're right. It's -- a working relationship. Don't know what I was expecting.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: I mean, if one little comment from Gary is gonna upset you this much --

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: What's extreme is what that ER doctor said when he pumped your stomach. Eat another sesame seed and that's it.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Isn't that -- extreme?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: If you can't deal with him on that basis, you better get a new counselor.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I know, I know.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: He's your boss. He's not your --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: That's what I'm asking myself. Does he have some genius stowed away? Why not let him write Skywire.  'Not saying it makes sense.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: What would it mean, anyway? If he didn't write it?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It's the way he said it. Just the way my dad did, when he was caught in a lie. That's how you knew you were onto something ugly.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: He gave me some new code-fixes this morning. I said, "Did you really do this just today?" Cause I was impressed. He said "What're you implying?"

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: That's what I need to ask you.  You know you can't keep anything from me.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: To our new life.  ...What's wrong?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Milo! What about --?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You know he's never been anybody's counselor before?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: We're not gonna let it.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: That took some fun out of --

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Prob'ly waiting by the phone for Outpost to call. We'll leave it for him?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: When's Brian coming for the TV?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You saved my life in alot of ways.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Don't bring that up. Like a different girlfriend would'd've let you die?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: C'mon, I wouldn't have a destiny without you. My destiny would be dying at 20. From eating --

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: No way. You have this -- destiny.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I forgot. That's why you have to help me decide.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Didn't you visit the campus?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: ...But?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: I think that's great, Milo. I do.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: If my dad'd leveled with me like that even once... The weird thing is, my fantasy he could somehow be like the old Gary? It's his fantasy, too.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: But he's not quite the same guy anymore. Don't get your hopes too high?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: When I was a kid? And he was moving us all over the place? I spent all my time writing stuff on Outpost 1.0. I thought Gary Boyd was the greatest.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Bully? Are we talking about Gary Boyd? Or your dad.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: If he's really a bully, he won't cop to it, anyway.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: It's important.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Then you've gotta ask him about that.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: A lot of what Larry says is true. They just clone stuff, or reverse engineer it, and everybody gets stuck with their inferior version cause they --

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: C'mon, how often do you talk to somebody who's been on the cover of Time. Three of four times.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I think I kind of lost it. I was just so thrilled to be talking to the richest, most powerful... 'Didn't know I even cared about that stuff.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: I don't think he knows how.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: He wasn't acting?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: He said it made sense that Gary's code was like Teddy's, that that clich? about great minds was true. Said it was all about his own guilt.  Plus, he has a tendency to get Gary mixed-up with his dad once in a while. It always passes.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Prick.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: Lisa's an extremely valuable member of the Skywire team. We've got our eyes on her. You keep yours on Milo.

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: Instead of busting my chops you should do something about that girl. Fire her. Or something.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: That'll be a test, won't it?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: He'll tell me when he gets home.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: Not like him, is it? To do a thing like that without telling you. You're not losing your hold on him, are you?

name: Movie
speaker: ALICE
text: No.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: 'Didn't mention he was going to the Justice Department?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Yes sir.

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: And Outpost? You're happy there?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: 'Just didn't know who else to talk to.

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: Let me look into it, see what's being done. Frankly, it's not my area.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I -- just wanna help bring these guys to justice. They're neo-Nazis.

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: If there's a Civil Rights violation. But generally we let the local police and DA do their work first.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It was racially motivated. He's Chinese. He was. And... I know sometimes the FBI gets involved with that. Don't they?

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: My goodness.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: My friend, my best friend, Teddy, was killed in Silicon Valley.

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: Milo?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I am. I am, sir.

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: What seems to be the problem? You look a little upset.

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: Have a seat.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Yeah. Hi. Thank you for seeing me.

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: Milo?

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: Give me two seconds with Lacy here?  Go on in, I won't be a moment.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Yes sir. I need to talk to you.

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: ...It's -- Milo, isn't it?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Mr. Barton, do you remember me?

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: Like I said: shot in the dark.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It's just -- I kind of feel the need to do something with my ability. Create something...

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: Beggar. We're at a disadvantage with Outpost. Our experts aren't as smart as theirs. Sometimes we can't tell which technologies pose the threat of a monopoly. We need a really smart guy to help us pick our fights. I'm taking a shot in the dark, here. I can offer you 32,000 a year, a Buick. I'm hoping you've got a feeling it's the right thing to do.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Right... What's that mean again?

name: Movie
speaker: BARTON
text: Don't worry, Milo. I'm here as a friend. Or maybe a supplicant.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You should've called a few times to bug me about your job prospects.

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: ...When did you know?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: He's working backwards, too.  Let's do number five?

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: What?!

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Is it your dish?

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: Is it your software?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Gimme the coordinates?

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: You're interfaced with our dish.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Wanna be a part of history?

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: What?!

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Great. Great! We need to drag a lot of heavy stuff in front of the door --

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: Okay.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: What'd they ever do for you?

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: No. But you can write your own ticket in the Valley after this. We're gonna bring down Outpost.

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: Will I get to work for Outpost?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Brian! You wanna be a big deal, don't you? That's your dream in life.

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: You can't pre-empt Yoga, that's our biggest show.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: This is the biggest Beta demo in like the history of software. You'd be my partner.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: 'Forgot to introduce you.  I have a girlfriend.

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: Well I parked illegally. See y'later?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Sure, I'll see what I can do.

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: 'Thought if I relocated it could help my case. I'm writing programs for the local public access station. Where any whack-job with 100 bucks gets his own show? God, does it suck.  Can you help me?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You're living here?

name: Movie
speaker: CYBER PUNDIT
text: You better believe everybody's trying to sign him up.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY KING
text: We tried!

name: Movie
speaker: CYBER PUNDIT
text: Milo. Surprised he's not your guest.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY KING
text: And the kid who wrote Skywire -- then gave it away? They're calling him the digital Robin Hood.

name: Movie
speaker: CYBER PUNDIT
text: Stigma? Larry! 60 billion buys you some slack in this world.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY KING
text: Isn't there a stigma? Bankrolling this guy?

name: Movie
speaker: CYBER PUNDIT
text: There's no hard evidence he knew about this. Anybody who could implicate him seems to've vanished.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY KING
text: That'd change with a criminal indictment.

name: Movie
speaker: CYBER PUNDIT
text: Conglomerates're lined up to finance the launch of the remaining satellites. They'll pay him a huge premium to get on-line.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY KING
text: Outpost doesn't own em.

name: Movie
speaker: CYBER PUNDIT
text: Outpost was his baby, sure. On the other hand, we just learned Gary Boyd owns the Skywire satellites. Personally.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY KING
text: That's gotta kill him, right?

name: Movie
speaker: DANNY
text: I think they call him the "Houseman." 'Cause "guard" sounds too weird.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Who's that?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: He just likes to write code. He's bummed there's so much secrecy and competition, everybody trying to own everything.

name: Movie
speaker: DANNY
text: We could move 'em up here.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: He's pretty tight with his family.

name: Movie
speaker: DANNY
text: 'Couldn't convince Teddy to come?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Oh hi.

name: Movie
speaker: DANNY
text: Milo? I'm Danny.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: I do know. You focus on the big problem. But somewhere down the chain, something breaks down. Something gets destroyed. At first it's upsetting. You feel you've lost control.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I'm pretty close. But when I wrote the last contact switches, it wiped out a piece of the content filer. You know what it's like, writing software.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I do know, Gary. I feel the same way. I thought I was coming here for a job. But it's meant a lot more.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: I hope you know what you mean to me. Not just because of what you're doing. Because of who you are.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: You see what's hanging on the wall?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Gary, I --

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Oh, that's right. You're "clueless."

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I'm not much good at handwriting. Or parties.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: You could've handwritten it.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I couldn't do it at work cause of security or at home for -- obvious reasons.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: "Dear Lisa. I've enjoyed working with you. I'd be lying if I didn't say I find you attractive. But in my heart I know that Alice..."  You left my party to send E-mail?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: 'Sorry about the late notice...

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: That's great! Thanks.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Don't be so hard on yourself. With a brain like yours, you could connive with the best of 'em I bet.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Cause he was a liar. And I hated him.  "Get your head out of that machine, wise up to the real world." The more he mocked me the deeper I went. Cause if being savvy meant being like him --  Guess that's why I'm kind of clueless, even now. Didn't cultivate my conniving side. 'Not sure I even have one.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: ...Worse?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: No. I just went deeper into the machine. Preferred being the geek to having to explain. Lying would've been worse.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: What would you tell the kids? At your new school? You had to come up with a good story, right?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: ...My dad was a compulsive gambler. Only he didn't think he was. That applied to guys who didn't have a "system." "Losers," who played games of chance. He could "read" people, so chance had nothing to do with it. No matter how deep a hole he dug himself, he'd give you the whole speech. And you'd better not point out the obvious.  His creditors would catch up to him. Loan sharks or whatever. He'd wake us in the middle of the night. Off we'd go, again.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Why did you move around so much? When you were a kid.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Sure.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: 'Have a look?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I'm okay. It's going well!

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: You look a little tired.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Gary, hi.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: The answer's not in the box. It's in the band.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: The wrong place?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Been thinking about the push mechanism in the handler. And it came over me: it's in the wrong place.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: 34,000. But they're real short lines. 'Just came out that way.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Wow. You must have 20,000 lines of code there...

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It helps. Alice said it would help. To focus on something.  'Don't know what I'd do without her.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: You've been coming in early.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Oh. Yeah.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: I meant did you find other stuff to --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Talk about work? Never!

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Did you?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Just once. 'Guess I was worried we didn't have anything to talk about, since work was off-limits. Non- disclosure.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Had you talked to him much lately?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Were the flags for Teddy?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: I heard what happened.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Definitely.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: It scales, don't you think?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: The purpose of this company isn't to destroy our competitors any more than the purpose of living is to breath. But the software business is binary: you're a zero or a one. Being obsessive isn't a crime. It's a character trait.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I'm sure.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Everything I do is under scrutiny. The questions they ask, trying to make anything strategic look sordid.  I'm confused. Doesn't everybody in business try to get ahead?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Nothing!

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: What're you implying.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You really wrote this just today?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Right... Right.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Well -- you sent for me.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Milo. What's up?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: You're making me young again.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You did this -- overnight?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Take a look at this. Slightly different approach.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It's okay. Really.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Too fast? At least four companies're on the verge of workable convergence systems, Milo, they --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Maybe I'm going too fast.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: How's it going?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Don't spend too much time searching. You ever vetted somebody's old code before?  It's a different skill. Stay close to the surface. The best-hidden secrets are in plain sight. You know the best place to hide a leaf, right?  In a tree.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Could work with a new switch. There may be a few more things hidden.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: That's what I told her. My wife.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: That's insane. You're ahead of your time.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Somebody said I'm just another Philistine. With reproductions.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: ...Do I?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: 'Think I should buy some originals?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Okay. I'm Gary.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: No! Just waiting for my counselor to come by and introduce himself.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Yeah? I wanna feel like I did when I wrote that. But I'm 42, that's 100 in cyber-years. I look at you and see the things that got me here.  But somehow got away.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I do!

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: When you get to a certain age, you start wondering. About your legacy. I doubt you even remember Outpost 1.0 --

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: You'd have to start practically from scratch. But this is all you'd be working on. No marketing meetings, no product seminars. We can't waste the time. Half the Valley's working on convergence. So're media conglomerates, cable companies, phone companies. 'Can't finish second, Milo. There is no second... Now what would you like to ask me?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It needs a more object-oriented language. This doesn't scale, does it?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: The content filer has t'be written into the media files so bits coming off the satellite can be read by multiplatforms. Really, omniplatforms. Including whatever new hardware emerges.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Skywire.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Among other things... We know convergence is the real super-highway: all the PC's, TV's, phones, etc. linked together. Why cram it into a cable if you can use the whole sky?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Low enough to relay internet traffic.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: I've only shown this to three other people. I bought 200, we've launched 12 so far. I keep the coordinates in this room.  It's left over from SDI. Reagan's Star Wars technology? They orbit 426 miles up.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: There's a rumor going around, maybe you've heard it.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You know a lot about art, I guess.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Oh. No thanks.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Would you like a Coke or something?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Cool!

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You would? Wow. When would we come?  'Think he hung up.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Milo? Gary Boyd. I'm hoping you and your friend can come up here. We've made some amazing strides in digital convergence. I'd love to show them to you.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: ...Hello?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Just do it.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: Gary?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: 'Knows I'm altering the coordinates. Let's jump to #12.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Wait... He knows.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: Longitude 109 --

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Let's go.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: Ready for number three?

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: Longitude 48 degrees 06 minutes --

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Okay, #2.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Just do what I'm asking!

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: Gary, don't worry, we --

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Help me change the Skywire settings. Add five degrees to each satellite coordinate.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Nothing does. Still. I want him to like me.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: Hasn't affected his work, though.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: There may be a little less trust after your outburst.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: What'd the girl say?

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: Maybe we should all get on it.

name: Movie
speaker: PHIL
text: 'Start-up not 50 miles from here. Kid's on Prozac.

name: Movie
speaker: GARY
text: This is good. Who did it?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Cool.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: You guys'll be using Teddy's old space, is that okay?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Got out of my other commitment.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: ...You wanna work -- here?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: We'll come up with the next big thing.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: Your app kind of blew mine out of the water.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Those really weird, short lines.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: Man, could he write code. Totally elegant. He had his own style.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It's only meaningful when you've got 40,000 lines of code to back it up.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: He was on the verge of something, too. He was gonna show us the next day. He said "The answer's not in the box, it's in the band." Know what it means?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Just thought his work should go on.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: You are naive. Look at your employment contract: you can't work anywhere else in this field for at least few years.  Not that I don't miss you.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I know you lost all his work. Maybe I could come down here and --

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: I mean, it's your life.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You do?

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: I think you should go.

name: Movie
speaker: LARRY
text: In exchange for endowments. They should just drop the pretense and name the schools after 'em.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: All the companies know. The faculties tell 'em. At the target schools.

name: Movie
speaker: LEN
text: I launched Skywire. Just pray the last set of coordinates Milo sent me connected us to Gary's satellite.

name: Movie
speaker: SHROT
text: Now what are we doing? I don't get any of this shit!

name: Movie
speaker: LEN
text: Where we going?

name: Movie
speaker: SHROT
text: Come with me.

name: Movie
speaker: SHROT
text: I'm calling Gary.

name: Movie
speaker: LEN
text: You calling Phil and Randy?

name: Movie
speaker: SHROT
text: They know. 'Just they don't trust me with it. So we'll get the evidence, first, ask questions later.

name: Movie
speaker: LEN
text: Get the backslash, the colon, keys kids don't use but geeks do.  What would Milo want in here, anyway?

name: Movie
speaker: SHROT
text: Let's get him in here.

name: Movie
speaker: LEN
text: Delbert seems to enter #21 twice. Without leaving the first time.

name: Movie
speaker: SHROT
text: Any irregularity in the pattern.

name: Movie
speaker: LEN
text: What're we looking for?

name: Movie
speaker: SHROT
text: Keep looking.

name: Movie
speaker: LEN
text: Every entry was authorized.

name: Movie
speaker: SHROT
text: Not yet. 'Love to bust my ass cause I'm not in frigging Mensa.  I swear to God, it's that kid Milo, I told 'em so in the first place, but they didn't even wanna hear about it.  Let's run a printout on card entries.

name: Movie
speaker: LEN
text: Unlikely. All 14 cameras are frozen. Do we call Randy and Phil? Tell 'em there may have been a break-in?

name: Movie
speaker: SHROT
text: Could it be a glitch? Something the construction workers caused?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Wait a second. He knows I know.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Latitude 47 degrees.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: He's been altering the coordinates since we logged on. He's a step ahead. Let's jump to #12.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: ...He knows.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Let's try #2.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Maybe it's the satellite.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: But you said the other --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Bring it to the other location.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: It's three years old, it --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: They know, I had no choice. Get out of the house now! Do you have a laptop?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Tell me you're not calling on your car phone?!

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Meet me at the other location.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: At this point the worst thing I could do is anything out of the ordinary.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Please don't go.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: She called to apologize. I said I was pulling an all-nighter. She said then come home just to say Hi. Which I always do when we fight, it's suspicious if I don't.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Why?!

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: He suspects I know something. I think he was sort of -- explaining himself to me, in case I do.  We have to go in tonight. I'm two hours from a Beta version.  But I've gotta go home for an hour.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Does he know you know?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: You'll come up with something.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: That's lame, isn't it?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: You could always say you have to go the bathroom.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Perfect.  How am I gonna get away from the party long enough to --

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Same with the excerpts I'm choosing: they'll play against any of the images you described.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Milo? What if Shrot notices somebody entered the Day Care at four A.M.? And tells them about it?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Oh.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Yeah, that's old, in a tree.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Hardly anybody does, that's the beauty part. No cameras, the DOJ doesn't bother with it, it's accessed by a tunnel they boast about. You know the best place to hide a leaf?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: He doesn't know about the Day Care.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: They know I broke in. Alice helped me.  Shrot's not one of them. He's blundering into this on his own.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Milo? Shrot suspects somebody broke into #21. I was in his office when he was reviewing the card readouts.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Thank God.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: The dishes are juiced up, too.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Great. I knocked off the aglet, as soon as I get a passable version of Skywire we're there.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Gary.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I felt guilty. 'Cause I "owed so much" to Alice. But even then I was starting to wonder. Is it so great to be so consumed by this one thing that you let another person do your thinking for you? If you have a lucrative skill, it's all anybody wants from you. You grow older but you don't grow up. You turn into -- into --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: "A beautiful geek? What're the chances?"

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: What'd he say?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I told Teddy about you.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: 'Cause their apartments might be bugged?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: 'Think everybody in this place is here the same reason we are?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Oh.  I liked you. I was checking you out.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Why were you snooping in my office?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: I thought the worst they would do is fire me. Who knew they took termination so literally?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Why were you so careless?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: And what if the broadcast dishes on top of 21 aren't hot yet? You said the place isn't finished.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I don't know --

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: You mean -- break in?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Oh, man. I'd have to get into Gary's house. To get the satellite positions.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Before they kill somebody else, too.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Gary knows I'm close on Skywire. We have to do this fast.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: It's a standard GUI. Once I've got a concept, it's maybe three day's work.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You'd have to design a graphic interface to make the data pop. Maybe some audio, too. To tie it all in to Gary. How long would that take you?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: But they'd still get the idea, right?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It's how on-line services push logos they wanna sell you. You don't ask for 'em, they just appear. 'Have to work on it somewhere besides my office or my house. And then the quality of the broadcast wouldn't exactly be digital, that's 12 months away.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: A what?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: We can't just assume they're standing by to receive Skywire 12 months from launch. I'd have to write in an aglet.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: He's got 12 satellites up. He's got dishes on top of 21. He's building this --  mega-network for Skywire. Let's use it.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: What?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: How close are you?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Time-Warner has a 40 per cent stake in Gary's set-top device. That also takes out CNN.  "GE joins Outpost in new venture," which means NBC is out. "Disney joins Outpost," ABC is out. "Outpost and Newscorp in new deal," Fox is out. Any of these places could have a mole. Or all of 'em.  It's like a a continuous loop. We can go to some alternative press place that 1,000 people read, get them and us killed. But anything big enough for this is a parent of or a subsidiary to something Gary's got a finger in!

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Time?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Say there's just one "mole" working there, like Barton at the DOJ. How do we know he's not the guy we've contacted? Or she? Or the guy she works for?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: But still, you can't say CBS wouldn't love to break something like --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Yeah, they dig stuff like this.  "CBS News has partnered with Outpost Information Systems in a cable news network due to launch Fall of 2001."

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: What about "60 Minutes."

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: He's buying up pretty much everything: cable companies, baby bells, picture libraries, museum rights, film archives... Getting ready for Skywire.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Certainly not at my happy home.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: We could cross-reference a data base on media ownership. But not on our own computers. Not even at home.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Right. But Gary's tied-in to a lot of media conglomerates. Have to be careful who we pick.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: The mainstream media. TV, or a newsmagazine.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: There're so many disinformation sites about Gary already. Where he has devil's horns or they crop him in with Saddam Hussein.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Do we post it on the Net?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: There's always a logical answer -- you just have to define the question.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Who can we trust?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: They've got this guy in the DOJ, maybe others. We tell the wrong person, it's over.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: What about the FBI?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: No, no. Never.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: I always felt if a -- boy I liked ever found out -- he'd run. He'd think I was unclean.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Hmm?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: ...Milo?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: They're already watching you. If they had to, they'd give him this drug that mimics an alcoholic blackout. He'd wake up not even remembering his "act of revenge."

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: He's out of prison?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: They'd frame him.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Is that my -- scenario?  Tell me.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Oh yeah?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I know why you're so secretive. Why you won't let anybody near you.  I know what he did to you.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You know. There is no second place. And what's the risk? The killings're undetectable, they're hand-tailored, they make "sense." I mean, they're in the information business. They have scenarios for all of us, too. In case we find out too much.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: But why would they --?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: It's easy to know who the smart geeks are, the schools tell 'em. They upload medical files, school records, pharmacy files. They'd be happy just to steal code forever. But when a program gets close to fruition. Like Teddy. He was almost there.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: The Day Care?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You thought about it too. You've been suspicious for a while. But it's not happening in there. It's happening in the Day Care.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Why would you do a thing like --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I snuck into #21.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: She saved my life.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: That's great. I -- didn't know.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Then and now.  But not right now.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: So, when you were talking about wishing people were more like computers. Was that then? Or now?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Long story. Not that interesting.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Why's that?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Mmm-more like -- I have a little trouble. Trusting people.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You're compulsive.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Maybe once. I re-wrote it, anyway.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Right, right. But does he ever just, like, hand you code?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Mine's not the CEO. He barely remembers to take a shower.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: "There is no second place." Plus every time I get jammed-up, Gary has an inspiration.  Is it like that with your counselor?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: They just pushed up the schedule on Skywire apps. How fast are you going?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: No. Please.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Did you wanna be alone?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Yeah? I ran it for lots of platforms, ranging from the narrowest bandwidth to --

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Cool!

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Show me.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: Graphical interfaces. For Skywire? I'm s'posed to coordinate with you.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: What've you got there?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: No, I know what you mean. I used to spend my life wishing people could be like computers. Least they make sense. Sometimes you think they've betrayed you. Like a person would. But then you see, no, you just missed a step. You can go back and make it all work.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Did I say something?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Didn't mean to pry. I just have this theory. Some of us who got to good at this? We were -- escaping something.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: ...Something like that. Yeah.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Me too! Were you an Army brat or something?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: We moved around so much I barely knew my teachers.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: ...Were you?

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: I wouldn't worry about it. You've gotta figure most people around here were their teachers' pets.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I'm getting a teacher's pet rep.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: You're famous around here.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: You know mine.

name: Movie
speaker: LISA
text: You know my name.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: Lisa.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I didn't plan this.

name: Movie
speaker: TEDDY
text: Milo, geeks don't have two girlfriends. Most don't have one.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: What does that mean?

name: Movie
speaker: TEDDY
text: I dunno. I guess Larry's got me totally suspicious of that place.

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: What d'you mean?

name: Movie
speaker: TEDDY
text: A beautiful geek? I don't wanna sound paranoid, or like a pig, but what're the chances?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: No! I keep thinking it'll go away. But there's this -- connection. She's been hacking since she was little, she had to move around a lot. Plus I see her every day, we're working on the same program. She's -- beautiful.

name: Movie
speaker: TEDDY
text: Did you tell Alice?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I don't know.

name: Movie
speaker: TEDDY
text: What? Come on. Is it serious?

name: Movie
speaker: MILO
text: I met this girl.

name: Movie
speaker: TEDDY
