name: Movie
speaker: SCOTT EVIL
text: No. Maybe, like, work in a petting zoo or something.

name: Movie
speaker: DR. EVIL
text: An evil vet?

name: Movie
speaker: SCOTT EVIL
text: Not me.

name: Movie
speaker: DR. EVIL
text: But Scott, who's going to take over the world when I die?

name: Movie
speaker: SCOTT EVIL
text: I haven't seen you my whole life and now you show up and want a relationship? I hate you!

name: Movie
speaker: DR. EVIL
text: Hello, Scott. I'm your father, Dr. Evil.  I have a son! I have a son! Everyone, I have a son!  Someday, Scott, this will all be yours.

name: Movie
speaker: SCOTT EVIL
text: Hi.

name: Movie
speaker: DR. EVIL
text: Oh, really?  One-hundred billion dollars.  OK, make it happen. Anything else?

name: Movie
speaker: NUMBER TWO
text: Virtucon alone makes over nine billion dollars a year.

name: Movie
speaker: DR. EVIL
text: All right then...  ...FIVE MILLION DOLLARS!

name: Movie
speaker: NUMBER TWO
text: Don't you think we should ask for more than a million dollars? A million dollars isn't that much money these days.

name: Movie
speaker: DR. EVIL
text: Right.  Oh, hell, let's just do what we always do. Let's hijack some nuclear weapons and hold the world hostage.  Gentlemen, it's come to my attention that a breakaway Russian Republic called Kreplachistan will be transferring a nuclear warhead to the United Nations in a few days. Here's the plan. We get the warhead, and we hold the world ransom...  ...FOR ONE MILLION DOLLARS!

name: Movie
speaker: NUMBER TWO
text: Umm, that also has already happened.

name: Movie
speaker: DR. EVIL
text: People have to tell me these things. I've been frozen for thirty years, throw me a bone here.  OK, no problem. Here's my second plan. Back in the Sixties I had a weather changing machine that was in essence a sophisticated heat beam which we called a "laser."  Using this laser, we punch a hole in the protective layer around the Earth, which we scientists call the "Ozone Layer." Slowly but surely, ultraviolet rays would pour in, increasing the risk of skin cancer. That is, unless the world pays us a hefty ransom.

name: Movie
speaker: NUMBER TWO
text: Um, Dr. Evil, Prince Charles did have an affair. He admitted it, and they are now divorced, actually.

name: Movie
speaker: DR. EVIL
text: Gentlemen, I have a plan. It's called blackmail. The Royal Family of Britain are the wealthiest landowners in the world. Either the Royal Family pays us an exorbitant amount of money, or we make it look like Prince Charles, the heir to the throne, has had an affair outside of marriage and, therefore, they would have to divorce.

name: Movie
speaker: NUMBER TWO
text: We also own the Franklin mint, which makes decorative hand-painted theme plates for collectors.  Some plates, like the Gone With The Wind series, have gone up in value as much as two-hundred and forty percent, but, as with any investment, there is some risk involved.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: I love you, Vanessa.

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: I'm on with a friend!  Look, I'd better go. I love you.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: No, it's been too long. Best to leave things alone.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: I know. Let me just say this: Austin was the most loyal and caring friend I ever had.

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: You didn't answer my question, Mum.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: Austin is very charming, very debonair. He's handsome, witty, has a knowledge of fine wines, sophisticated, a world-renowned photographer. Women want him, men want to be him. He's a lover of love-- every bit an International Man of Mystery.

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: Did you ever want to?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: Of course not. I was married to your father.

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: Did you ever...

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: Just wait. Once Austin gets you in his charms, it's impossible to get out.

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: I just don't see it.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: You have to understand, in Britain in the Sixties you could be a sex symbol and still have bad teeth. It didn't matter.

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: What about his teeth?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: You can't judge him by modern standards. He's very much a product of his times. In my day he could have any woman he wanted.

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: Well, God knows he tried, but I've been rather firm with him, Mummy. You didn't tell me he was so obsessed with sex. It's bizarre.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: Because you managed to resist Austin Power's charms.

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: Why?

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: I'm proud of you.

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: Oh, God no, I made him sleep on the couch.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: You didn't...

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: He's asleep.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: How's Austin?

name: Movie
speaker: VANESSA
text: Great.

name: Movie
speaker: MRS. KENSINGTON
text: Oh, hello Vanessa. How was the flight?

name: Movie
speaker: THERAPIST
text: OK, Scott, no one really wants to "kill" anyone here. They say it, but they don't mean it.

name: Movie
speaker: SCOTT EVIL
text: I just think, like, he hates me. I really think he wants to kill me.

name: Movie
speaker: THERAPIST
text: Scott.

name: Movie
speaker: SCOTT EVIL
text: No, he's really evil.

name: Movie
speaker: THERAPIST
text: We don't label people here, Scott.

name: Movie
speaker: SCOTT EVIL
text: I don't know. I was thinking, maybe I'd be a vet or something, cause I like animals and stuff.

name: Movie
speaker: THERAPIST
text: What do you want to do, Scott?

name: Movie
speaker: SCOTT EVIL
text: I don't wanna take over the family business.

name: Movie
speaker: THERAPIST
text: And how do you feel about that?

name: Movie
speaker: SCOTT EVIL
text: OK. Well, I just really met my Dad for the first time three days ago. He was partially frozen for thirty years. I never knew him growing up. He comes back and now he wants me to take over the family business.

name: Movie
speaker: THERAPIST
text: We don't judge here.

name: Movie
speaker: SCOTT EVIL
text: Well, it's kind of weird.

name: Movie
speaker: THERAPIST
text: So, Scott, why don't we start with you. Why are you here?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: No need. I'll call again.

name: Movie
speaker: BAILEY
text: The technology is brand new. Soon it will be more powerful. We anticipate a huge demand. Leave us your number. We'll be in touch.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: There are limits?

name: Movie
speaker: BAILEY
text: As real as you wish. Hot or cold. Humid or dry. Anything you like. Within reason.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: You don't say. How real does it feel?

name: Movie
speaker: BAILEY
text: Of course. Natural weather delivered to your door on demand. Down your phoneline. For limited periods.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Seriously?

name: Movie
speaker: BAILEY
text: Normally, we'd be eager to oblige --

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Sir August Merryweather? I was looking for something relaxing. Say, a Tuscan hillside in June?

name: Movie
speaker: BAILEY
text: Really?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Shame. I was recommended. By a friend.

name: Movie
speaker: BAILEY
text: We're not yet open for business, I'm afraid.

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Ah, but you haven't see the real me. Watch closely ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Would that I could say the Same.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: So I'm still ...

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: He said if it vanished, he'd know it was ... you who betrayed him. He took a huge risk. The ultimate test.

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Three days.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: How long have I been here?

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Peter ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... love ...

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Fear ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... love ...

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Hope...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... love...

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Secret ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... preserve...

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Nature ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... power ...

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Flower ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... death ...

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Love...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... death ...

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Black...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Knight ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... head ...

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: Red ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... bottle ...

name: Movie
speaker: DR. DARLING
text: I want you to say the first thing that comes into your head when I say these words. Do you understand ... ?  Blue ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Sir August...?  What now?

name: Movie
speaker: SIR AUGUST
text: Mrs. Peel ... Come quickly. Brolly's been betrayed! I'll tell you everything ... The weather's getting worse and worse ... they're after me ... coming for me ... come quickly!

name: Movie
speaker: SIR AUGUST
text: There, look!

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Promised? Who promised?

name: Movie
speaker: SIR AUGUST
text: Ah, beautiful. Just as he promised.

name: Movie
speaker: SIR AUGUST
text: You mean you don't recall??

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Have we met?

name: Movie
speaker: SIR AUGUST
text: You

name: Movie
speaker: SIR AUGUST
text: Out in India. So character-forming for the British. Not the heat. Good Lord, no. The rain, dash it. A good monsoon. Fifteen inches overnight. A whole week of lovely rain. I remember one summer in Jaipur ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I so agree. How did you acquire a taste for it?

name: Movie
speaker: SIR AUGUST
text: You don't get rain like you used to in England. A good shower that's the ticket. Stiffens resolve, puckers the spirit, quells the namby-pamby in a man.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I've come to apply for membership in Brolly --

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Really -- what happened in 1922?

name: Movie
speaker: PORTER
text: No women. Not in Boodles. Not since 1922.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I have an appointment.

name: Movie
speaker: PORTER
text: Then you can't come in.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: As you see.

name: Movie
speaker: PORTER
text: You are female?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Impossible?

name: Movie
speaker: PORTER
text: I'm afraid that's impossible.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Mr. John Steed, please.

name: Movie
speaker: PORTER
text: May I help you, madam ...

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: You and I. Together. But first you must confront your greatest enemy. Who could that be, Mrs. Peel? The answer is obvious ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Then who wins?

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: People, too.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Rules are made to be broken.

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: Quite right, but we still make the rules.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: This isn't a game.

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: Congratulations, Mrs. Peel. You have been a worthy opponent. You have tracked us down. You are within an ace of winning.

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: We have met ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Your voice -- it's so familiar ...

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: If nature gives a man a collector's mind, it doesn't matter what he collects. Butterflies. Old China. Penny farthings. A true collector grows more obsessive as the years pass.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Quite a collection.

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: Eh? In here!

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Sir August ... ? Sir August ... ?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Thank you, Steed.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Ahem. As I was saying, perhaps another macaroon ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Next assignment?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: About your next assignment, Mrs. Peel ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: So am I.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: The doors and walls are monitored, Mrs. Peel. This is a very secure establishment.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: To find out who killed my husband.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: This is an official matter, Mrs. Peel. No need to take it personally. Where are you going?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Quite frankly ... it could have been you.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Who?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: A cover ... for us.  I'm sorry...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: The Institute ... the funding ...

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Peter Peel was a first class agent. A senior operative. 'X' department Special operations. He was engaged in top secret research. Top priority.  Government approved.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: To you ... ?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: The death of Peter Peel was a great loss. To us all ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I thought I was a widow. My husband ... the only man I ever loved ... is dead. For the rest of my life I have to live with that.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: We want to help...!

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: What are you trying to do to me?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Watch me.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: You need treatment, Mrs. Peel.  You can't resign.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I resign.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: After the cold war ...

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: London. The World Council of Ministers meets soon on global defence. If you can control the weather, you control the world.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Directed by laser. Bounced by satellite. Quite possible.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Would it be possible to use it for military purposes?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: He tried to warn us ...

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Welcome to mobile H.Q. Weather's turning quite nasty. Sir August was blown to smithereens. Along with half of Banffshire.  The Ministry's worried.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Ropes?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Father will be your controller. Steed here will show you the ropes.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Something strange is happening. And whoever knows about it doesn't want us to find out.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: How curious ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Let me guess -- 'Father'?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: My number two. Special assignments. She's --

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Looks like rain, Steed...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Hmmm ...

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Close. We're so hush-hush, even we know nothing about it.  Now let's see, there's coconut cake, date and walnut; I recommend the rum baba ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I'll never marry you.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Choices?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: What are my choices?

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Speaking of Peter, there's more good news: You won't even have to change your last name. You'll always be Mrs. Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: How Wagnerian ... Do you mean to say you've waited all these years because you couldn't create a chip on your own? That would have amused Peter.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: The missing piece of the jigsaw. I tried to get you to give it to me as Peter; I tried to steal it from you as Dr. Darling. As myself I'll be a bit less subtle.  With this ring my plan will be complete.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: One very small thing. A diamond 'cyclone' chip. A thousand times more information on a fraction of the size. If I possess that, my powers would be unlimited. My dear half-brother was developing it. But he suspected sabotage. He gave the chip to ... you, 'Mrs.' Peel. I want you. But also your ring.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Then what's stopping you?

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Chaos. Transport paralysis. Crop failure.  Economic disaster. Frostbite or sunburn ... on a massive scale. You've seen a few samples...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: The result would be ...

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Destruction of their local weather systems. I can zap a thousand Chernobyls into the air.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Such as?

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Entirely. On the other hand  Mad people get things done. Let me show you --

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You're mad.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: That's better. I say, isn't this where you came in? It's impenetrable, by the way ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Ring?

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Right, bridesmaid. Now what have I left out? Oh, yes, I know: the ring.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Valentine, listen to me ...

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: You know, I believe she's actually jealous.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Come, come, you're a widow -- a most attractive widow. Now I think of it, we'll need a bridesmaid. Here.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I'm already married ...

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Think of this as your second wedding feast ...

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Oh, no, Emma. They've only just begun ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: 'Our revels now are ended.'

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: You disappoint me, Emma.  Can't you guess?  For you. It was all for you ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: But -- why?

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Of course. I planned that, too.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: But I found you. All the clues led me here ...

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Spoil the majority shareholders. In Wonderland Weather. I planned everything, even the Ministry recruiting you ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Too many cooks --

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: For starters. Of course I had to kill the Teddy Bears, as well ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You killed my husband.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: An unholy trinity ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Dr. Darling, Peter ... all you ...

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: A slight miscalculation -- my face was burned beyond recognition. Fortunately my research into plastics came in handy ...

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Darling Emma -- yes, we:  the true genius behind the Prospero Project ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Thanks, Valentine ...

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Good luck ... Peter ... Emma.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Must be. Trubshaw's busy. I'll send Mother ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Ah ... sun tan lotion. Any shops nearby?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Pity your mother came, too ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Our chaperon.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Not quite.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Our little paradise -- just made for two?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: It's the latest thing, Mrs. Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I don't recall Siberia being this warm, Steed.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: As a matter of fact I have ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Have you any place in mind?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: English weather. You know, after all we've been through, I should say we deserve a long holiday ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Still a bit chilly ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: A fine night, Mrs. Peel ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: '... in a beautiful pea green boat...'

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: 'The owl and the pussycat went to sea -'

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: The plot.  Hello, we must be going ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: What kept you?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Mrs. Peel?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: If you'd been through what I have, you wouldn't --

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Oh, and by the way, I think it's about time you got rid of that chip on your shoulder.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: But --

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: No bother. Mother and Father think I've joined you. I might as well.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You needn't bother. I can't drag you further into this. After all, I am still the chief suspect.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Laying in supplies, Mrs. Peel weather may get very nasty and I've no umbrella ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Where are you going?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I'll be back ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Have a look at this.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Bad news. Father's looking for you. Where are those bloody ministers?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: 'The Merry Widow?' I might have known. Where's the reception?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: They're playing your song, Mrs. Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Snuff.  I must insist you try some.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Trubshaw again? What now?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Shall we?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: You first.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: When all this is over, we simply must get you out of that suit.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Limpet bomb. Small, very compact. From Trubshaw's.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: What is it?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Intoxicating. Here, have one of these.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: It's called Black Leather.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: What's that you're wearing?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Have we been invited?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: There's a reception this evening. Colonel Jones thinks it advisable we attend.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: You didn't tell her?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Hurry?  What for?  I'm just now --

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: We must hurry, Mrs. Peel ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I'll catch you up. Don't worry; he's expecting you.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Aren't you coming?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: You'll find out.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Why's he called 'Invisible'?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: His name's Jones. 'Invisible' Jones.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I'm a wanted woman, I know ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Very well. I have a friend who might be of assistance. He's at the Ministry. We'd better be careful.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Not to speak of. Peter and I were both loners. There was nobody.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Quite. Any childhood friends? Enemies?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... Or grown-ups, who still like to be children.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Teddy bears, cuckoo clocks, toys All children's things ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: No idea who. No idea why ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Drat. Someone wants to implicate you in this affair, Mrs. Peel. Any idea who?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I equivocated. But you're not their big worry at present. It's Dr. Darling:  he's disappeared ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You lied.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I told Mother I took care of you.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: As far as you trust me.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: You don't trust me?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: No, after you.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: After you -- Mrs. Peel ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Please don't tell me it's how you play the game.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Winning isn't everything.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I'm playing to win.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I thought you didn't.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I thought you played by the rules.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Aren't we all, Mrs. Peel?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You're playing games.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Not for a moment.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: But you did suspect me.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Is that all?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Keeping a stiff upper lip?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Mmm ... what are you doing?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: It wasn't me; you have my word.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I could be convinced, if ... I knew who poisoned me in the maze. That kiss ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: And do you trust me?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: ... when I don't. It comes down to one thing, Mrs. Peel. Trust.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Yes ... ?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Always.  Except ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Because you always obey orders ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: No trouble.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I could save you the trouble.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Nothing personal.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: To kill me?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Orders.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You followed me.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: It was Peter -- I saw him ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I expect that's for you to know and me to find out ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Was I?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: The Winslow Home for Retired Lepidoptorists. I'm so sorry I struck you, Mrs. Peel. Please forgive me. I thought you were someone else ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Where am I?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Mrs. Peel ... ?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Steed ... !

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I expect we'll have to gatecrash.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Someone didn't want us to get to the party.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Here's the one that broke the camel's back.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: This must be the last straw.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: You will let me know if you find that queen who's in need of protection, won't you?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Barely.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: What, Lady Disdain? Are you yet breathing?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Have I trespassed on a male prerogative?  We're being followed. I saw him at Trubshaw's ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Do you always drive this fast?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Oh, well ...  Just my type, Mrs. Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Is that what you think?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: According to Dr. Darling, you're a psychopathic personality with schizophrenic delusions, suffering from recurring amnesia based on traumatic repression, leading to outbursts of anti-social and violent behavior.  Q.E.D.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Not that I know of.  Explanation?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: ... And by you, Mrs. Peel. Everything points to you.  No sisters?  No undiscovered twin?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Then a mad millionaire. Head of a secret defense establishment. A group of eccentrics obsessed by weather ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: ... And by you, Mrs. Peel ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Three agents killed by bad weather...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Sounds as if someone's hijacked your research.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: That's what we were working on.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: But if someone miniaturized the process...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Exactly. There'd been earlier attempts to pump carbon dioxide into deep sea. Propane gas mostly. In small quantities it captures chlorine. Protects the ozone layer. But it proved impractical. Too bulky ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Filling in mother nature's blind spots ... ?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: The Prospero Project was started by my husband. It was an early attempt to solve the problems of global warming. In theory, climate engineering is entirely feasible. We thought of injecting a chemical cocktail into the atmosphere by laser and satellite. A 'quick fix'...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Is there anything that isn't?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Not quite. This is my field.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Don't bother.  Here's a bus ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: But

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Thanks ...  I see what you mean about letting me do the risking ... Hello?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: For you, Mrs. Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: She had this in her mouth. There, there...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Common knowledge, Mrs. Peel ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Is that written in his shoe?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Well, he was a fellow of the Royal Zoological Society ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Any ideas?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: What on earth?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Very good, Steed ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Elementary, Mrs. Peel. Trubshaw isn't the only shoemaker still practicing his trade ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: How on earth can you tell?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Colonel Crabtree. International Satellite Systems. Formerly of the Ministry.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I should have thought that was obvious ...  I'm in mourning.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Either way ... may I ask: why you dress in that fashion?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You mean my other self ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I must say, you look more your old self --

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Did you say formal? I must dress.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: An invitation. To a 'formal picnic'...?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: No. But he must know. Incidentally, my double left you with this.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Did he say who?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: That's possible. Sir August was convinced he'd met me before. But I'd never met him. Another odd thing. When it rained, he said it was just as someone had promised.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Perhaps your memory plays tricks, Mrs. Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: But that's absurd. I may not be over-fond of you, Steed, but it's not my style.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Frankly that's how I remember it.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You told them. You said I arrived on a camel, shot you four times. Left you for dead.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Why should they think that?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Mother and Dr. Darling have me under observation. They think I tried to kill you.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I might say the same.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I mean your man Trubshaw.  Your bullet-proof waistcoat.  I thought you were just overdressed.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I wasn't about to.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You were very lucky.  Four shots to the heart. I found you after I slipped away from Sir August. Mother brought you here. Not me you should thank.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Strange.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You should be dead.  How do you feel?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Ah, Brenda ...  Mrs. Peel?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Small talk.  Try the weather.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: So ... I distract him while you snoop around? How?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: All of a piece, really. A fanatical weatherman. Chairman of BROLLY.  British Royal Organisation For Lasting Liquid Years. Thinks British weather has been tampered with by ... aliens.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Any other vices?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: The family does seem to be somewhat meteorologically inclined.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: June, July ... August?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Not so much eccentric. More barking mad. He has a wife called June. And a daughter somewhere -- Julie.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: An eccentric recluse?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: According to Mother, Sir August owns half of the Highlands. A millionaire. Former head of Special Projects at the Ministry. Now ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I meant me.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: No thanks.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: After our fencing match, I was rather hoping you would do the risking. More tea?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I have no choice. Why should you risk your life?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: They call me in when they've reached a dead end. Freelance. Like yourself.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Just what is your position, if you don't mind my asking.  How did a stuffed shirt like you get into this line of work?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: For a man in my position --

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Do we always follow Mother's instructions?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: As per mother's instructions.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Sir August Merryweather ... why are we seeing him first?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: That's predictable. When I find a queen in need of protection I'll let you know.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: The most unpredictable piece on the board. And always ready to protect his queen.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: And I suppose you're the knight.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: A Gentleman has to have a code. This is part of mine. A uniform. Think of it as my suit of shining armor.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: But why? What's the point?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Not all Tradition is bad, Mrs. Peel. No thank you.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You know what I mean. This car -- and you. Nobody walks around like that. Milk?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Do you really think so?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: That place is so absurd, so out of date ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Thank you, Trubshaw ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You can but I wish you wouldn't ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Ahh. Perfect fit. The luxury of a hand-made shoe. As unique as a face or a fingerprint. Or should I say DNA?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Steed, we really must be --

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Or half cocked.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Oh, absolutely, but Trubshaw's a man worth meeting. No point setting out half shod.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I thought we were on our way.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Yes indeed. I need protection.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Do you?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I had a feeling you would. Touche!

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Really?  I fail to see the connection.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: My father always wanted a boy.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: A kipper. Or a red herring? What were they investigating?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Ah ... From Trubshaw's.  My shoemaker.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: We're not here to talk about the weather, surely.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: ... Showers followed by sunny periods.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Mother?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I didn't. Mother did.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: And now that we've settled the matter of honorifics, will you kindly explain why you wished me to meet you?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Much better.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Under the circumstances, you may call me Mrs. Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I say, this is all terribly formal. Must I go an calling you Dr. Peel?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: And just what is the game?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Not by me. Play by the rules, Doctor, or the game is nothing.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Rules are made to be broken.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Dyed in the wool. But I can admire someone who doesn't play by the rules.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Whereas you are.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Congratulations, you've penetrated a bastion of male privilege. I guessed you weren't a stickler for Tradition, doctor.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: So what was all this -- some sort of test?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Red herring would have been too obvious, don't you think?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: 1922. Why the kippers?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I shouldn't wonder. Not a woman inside Boodles since --

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I had a spot of bother at the door.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I was about to throw in the towel.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: And you must be Steed. Please don't get up.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Doctor Peel, I presume?

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: And you've a new wardrobe. He does want you to look attractive.  He tells me you're very beautiful.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Decontamination -- ?

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: Emma in Wonderland. Welcome, Mrs. Peel.  We've been expecting you. We hope you'll enjoy your stay with us. Decontamination is almost complete.

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: It's Mother you have to convince. He's very agitated.  Wait here.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You don't believe him?

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: Mobile HQ. In a blue funk.  Can't take chances. I'm looking after things while he's hiding out ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Where's Mother?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: You're saying I have no choice.

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: Think of it as special assignment, Mrs. Peel. With a twist. You're our chief suspect.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I'm no spy -- where do I fit in?

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: Your mission is simple. Find out how and why these agents died.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I'm going to find out who killed my husband. Will you take these documents to Steed?

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: You're not venturing alone, surely.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I shall need a small plane.

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Very good, Mrs. Peel ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Let me guess:  Wonderland Weather.

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Privately owned by ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: ... and now?

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: 'X' marks the spot. The shoes were delivered to ... an island in Hyde Park. Surrounded by the Serpentine. On the site of a former Ministry installation...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Well, I can't possibly go like this.

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Under the circumstances Mother didn't see fit, but I think I can get you in ...

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I fail to see --

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: The World Council of Ministers meets tomorrow to convene the new global defense initiative --

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Getting to what?

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: I was getting to it.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Are you suggesting that Dr. Darling and Valentine were somehow in this together? But that's absurd.

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Makes two of us.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Who's now vanished.

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Father. She gave him an 'all clear' after a security test by Dr. Darling.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Surveillance? By whom?

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Do you also know that during your final experiment, your halfbrother- in-law was under surveillance?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I know all this.

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Now let's see ... Eton, Cambridge ... research into robotics and plastics. Overtaken by Peter's work on the physics of climate change ...

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Half-brother to be precise.

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: Peter's brother?  But --

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Ah, here we are. Steed asked me to play a hunch:  Valentine Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Or rather, you don't. Learnt the tricks in camouflage. Till this accident made a prang of things. How can I help you, Mrs. Peel?

name: Movie
speaker: EMMA
text: I see.

name: Movie
speaker: INVISIBLE JONES
text: Talk to the pipe, Mrs. Peel. That usually helps. Don't worry about me being invisible. Other than that I'm perfectly normal.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Well, you found me. Have a sniff of this, why don't you? Careful, the scent can be overpowering ...

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: Mother betrayed me. She was going to replace me with a younger Father.  Errand boy that's all I was. 'Find Steed...'

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: It was you who gave Valentine Peel his security clearance ... you're the mole who betrayed the Ministry.

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: You reek of Mrs. Peel's Black Leather ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: How did you guess?

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: Steed

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Dead, I'm afraid.

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: We want Mrs. Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Oh, hello ...

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: So you say ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: We know one thing. That suspect was not Mrs. Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: Jungle plants in the Arctic? A lush English village transformed overnight into African scrubland? Blizzards in summer?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Global warming?

name: Movie
speaker: FATHER
text: A series of bizarre shifts in local weather patterns ...

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: I'm warning you for the last time, Steed: whoever's behind all this, looks like Mrs. Peel, walks like Mrs. Peel and kills like Mrs. Peel.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: In your operation.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Where?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I'm going to follow up on a hunch of my own. If I'm right, Mrs. Peel is innocent and you have a mole.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: You're getting yourself into terrible trouble, my son. Weather's turning very nasty -- and so am I.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I was hoping you could tell me.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Mother and Father know best.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Guilty until proven innocent?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Pity. I was growing fond of Mrs. Peel. Unfortunately --

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Her husband suspected someone very close to the operation. On the day he died, he was setting a test. To prove to himself -- to us that his wife was beyond suspicion. He had to be certain. He said he was going to give Mrs. Peel something ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: You're accusing Mrs. Peel of killing her own husband?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: No. Her husband, she says. Alice tried to warn us. A trap. Tell Mother beware. Tell Father That's all.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: This man -- did you see him?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Impossible.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Too late anyway. Today's escapade was only for starters. This is no ordinary weather. It's manmade. A kind of weather bomb.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: We had a lead to Wonderland Weather but we got there too late. Someone tipped them off ...

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: You.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Anyone particular in mind?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Still doesn't. Better safe than sorry.  She was in a dangerous game, Steed. High stakes. She may prove to be a risk.  If she is, there's only one solution.  Termination.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: How come you took so much interest in her, Dr. Darling?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Something went wrong. System malfunction. Explosion. Mrs. Peel had a narrow escape. Suspected sabotage. Nothing proven. File still open.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: She may try to kill you.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Why?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Who knows? If Dr. Darling is right, you should watch out.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Insane ... ?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Possibly. Split personality ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Amnesia?

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: She may not know. Theory goes she may be very ill.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Think she really killed those agents?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Perhaps I'd better start calling you doctor again, Mrs. Peel --

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Your research into climate engineering was state-of-the-art. Your experiments could have revolutionized our knowledge of global warming -- had they succeeded. We need your expertise.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Oh yes I did. I want you to meet somebody.  I expect you'll like her.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: You didn't come to talk about the weather, surely.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Weather's turning nasty.

name: Movie
speaker: MOTHER
text: Brenda and I thought we'd drop in.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Mother. I thought you were burglars.

name: Movie
speaker: OLD LADY
text: This way ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Wonderland Weather Ltd.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: You don't say.  Like looking for a needle in a ...

name: Movie
speaker: OLD LADY
text: Good. Glad to see they're together at last. They don't get along. Promotion. Top job. Most unfair. Quite a fuss at the Ministry.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Both, actually.

name: Movie
speaker: OLD LADY
text: You with Mother or Father?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: She was ...

name: Movie
speaker: OLD LADY
text: I'm Alice. Mother said you'd be on your way. Mrs. Peel with you?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I feel sure of it.

name: Movie
speaker: OLD LADY
text: Cocky little bastard. I hope he was a baddy.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I think so, thank you so much ...

name: Movie
speaker: OLD LADY
text: Are you alright, young man?

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: Stay by the window. By the window.

name: Movie
speaker: SIR AUGUST
text: Let it be rain, please let it be --

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: Walk over to the window ...

name: Movie
speaker: SIR AUGUST
text: No, please! I beg you ...

name: Movie
speaker: VOICE
text: Ask not for whom the telephone rings ...

name: Movie
speaker: SIR AUGUST
text: Mrs. Peel -- ?

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Ugh ...

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I think she really likes you ... Where's Mrs. Peel?

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Come, come. You don't really expect me to fall for --

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: You are, and it's behind you.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: Aren't you forgetting about something?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Did I? My mistake.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: You said ... one shot.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I do.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: If you say so.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Rules are made to be broken.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: That's not playing by the rules.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: One shot -- for emergencies.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: You wish.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Bang-bang ... you're dead.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: But did they teach you this?

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: I was at Harrow ...

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: You're better than I expected.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Perish the thought.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: The last one you'll ever see.

name: Movie
speaker: STEED
text: Valentine Peel. I see you've gone back to using your original face.

name: Movie
speaker: VALENTINE
text: John Steed.

name: Movie
speaker: BOBBIE
text: Check out the other guy's buns.

name: Movie
speaker: PHOEBE
text: Look at that guy. What a hunk.

name: Movie
speaker: BOBBIE
text: Deb, I want to throw you a shower.

name: Movie
speaker: PHOEBE
text: I'm totally blown away. You're getting married. It seems like only yesterday I showed you how to have oral sex.

name: Movie

name: Movie
speaker: STEPHEN
text: -- I tried, y'know? Helen's right. I don't have all the answers, but goddamn it, I've got some.  Look, you're gonna do what you have to, and maybe I shouldn't have gotten in the way. I'm your brother, not your father. Go on. You gotta go somewhere? Go...

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: It's okay, Stephen, I --

name: Movie
speaker: STEPHEN
text: -- Okay, so you don't like me. You don't like everything I've done. What, because I wasn't such a genius the way I raised you? Jesus Christ, dad was gone, what was I supposed to do? You tell me, what the fuck was I supposed to do?!

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: Look, Stephen, maybe we can talk about this some other --

name: Movie
speaker: STEPHEN
text: Yeah? What have you got to do?  Look at you. Look at your face. All the things you must be thinking. Man, you must really hate my guts. Well, you know what? It's okay.

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: I really should get back. There's... there's something I'm supposed to do.

name: Movie
speaker: STEPHEN
text: Yeah, it's just another memory in my life right now. And I got way too many of them...

name: Movie
speaker: BRIAN
text: You're selling dad's boat?

name: Movie
speaker: STEPHEN
text: Well, long as you're here you can help clean up a little. I've got a guy coming to look at this in a few minutes.

name: Movie
speaker: STEPHEN
text: So hello.
